loans.name: Tuychiboy

texts.en:
Tuychiboy lives in a village with his wife and six children. The family gathers their main income from farming; they cultivate onions. He has been busy with this business more than ten years. 

He has applied for this loan to purchase seeds and chemical fertilizers. Such expansion will significantly increase his profit from agriculture. 

Tuychiboy plans to use his profit for purchasing more seeds and chemicals and minerals in the future. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty, de 50 años, es una mujer emprendedora. Vive en su  casa  propia, sola, pues sus hijos ya son independientes. El trabajo de Betty consiste en las confecciones de ropa para damas y niñas como blusas, polos, ropas interiores,  entre otros. Su actividad lo realiza en un pequeño espacio dentro de su vivienda. Lleva 6 años en este trabajo, pues se inicio con unas amigas que estaban confeccionando vestidos para señoritas que cumplían 15 años; desde entonces vio un negocio rentable. Ahora sus amigas son socias y juntas confeccionan ropa en volumen. Su familia la apoyo financieramente para que comprará su primera maquina de coser. Ahora espera formar una pequeña microempresas junto a sus amigas porque cada día sus clientes se incrementan y tiene ya varios pedidos.  Por tanto desea solicitar, 2,000 soles para comprar implementos en volumen como telas, hilos, algodón, etc. Al comprar al por mayor obtiene la  mercancía a menor precio.  Esto le permitirá incrementar sus ingresos económicos en el futuro.
texts.en: Fifty-year-old Betty is an enterprising woman.  She lives in her own home by herself, as her children are independent.  Betty's work consists of sewing women's and little girls' clothing, such as blouses, polo shirts, and lingerie, among other things.  She carries out her business in a small space in her home.  She has been doing this work for six years; she started out with some friends who were sewing dresses for young ladies who were turning 15 and she saw that it was a profitable business.  Now her friends are her partners and together they sew clothing in bulk.  Her family gave her the financial support to buy her first sewing machine.  Currently, she hopes to form a small company along with her friends because she has more customers every day and she already has several orders.  As such, she is asking for 2,000 soles to buy supplies in bulk, such as fabric, thread, cotton, etc.  By buying wholesale she can get her merchandise and a lower price.  This will allow her to increase her income in the future.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and cotton

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Sixto

texts.es: Sixto, tiene la edad  de 53 años, está casado, vive con su esposa  que es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de otra en trabajos de asistencia para el tabaco. Además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de tabaco. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Sixto, 53, is married living with his wife who is his greatest priority.  He intends to use his loan to buy fertilizer, fungicide and to pay labor costs to do tobacco crop maintenance in order to take advantage of the good fertility of the soil, the weather and other conditions that are favorable for tobacco growing.  With these improvements, he hopes to earn a bit of profits to improve his family’s living conditions and also to have some to invest more in the crops and to reach some goals.  This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans with state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Emomali

texts.ru: Эмомали проживает в районе Рудаки. Ему 30 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Эмомали уже четыре года занимается животноводством. Он разводит мелко - рогатый скот у себя дома. Эмомали берет кредит для закупа овец и коз.
texts.en: Emomali lives in the Rudaki region.  He is 30 years old.  He is married.  He has four children.  Emomali has been raising animals for four years.  He raises small horned livestock at his home.  Emomali is taking out a loan to purchase sheep and goats.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and goats

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru: Парвина жительница города Душанбе. Ей 29 лет. Парвина замужем. Муж Парвины пекарь. Он печет лепешки для торговли. Парвина портниха. Она занимается шитьем национальных платьев. В этой области Парвина имеет богатый опыт. На сегодняшний день она работает в ателье. Парвина хочет продолжить свою деятельность после работы у себя дома. Она берет кредит для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en: Parvina lives in Dushanbe.  She is 29 years old.  Parvina is married.  Parvina's husband is a baker.  He bakes flatbread for sale.  Parvina is a seamstress.  She sews traditional dresses.  Parvina has rich experience in this area.  Today she works at a tailoring studio.  Parvina would like to continue her activity after work at her home.  She is taking out a loan for the purchase of a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Mirzodavlyat

texts.ru: Мирзодавлят проживает в городе Душанбе. Ему 49 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его жена работает по специальности. Мирзодавлят предоставляет услугу. Он занимается частным извозом по городу. Но чаще всего он работает на линии №3. Таксистом Мирзодавлят работает четыре года. Он берет кредит для приобретения новой автомашины.
texts.en: Mirzodavlyat lives in the city of Dushanbe.  He is 49 years old.  He is married.  He has two children.  His wife works in her profession.  Mirzodavlyat provides a service.  He is a taxi driver in the city, but most often he works on line number 3.  Mirzodavlyat has been working as a taxi driver for four years.  He is taking out a loan to purchase a new car.

loans.use: to purchase a new car

loans.name: Rafoat

texts.ru: Портниха, которая является мастером своего дела, нуждается вашей поддержки.  Рафоат опытная портниха и создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. Ей  28 лет. Она разведена и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 2 года назад она начала свой бизнес. Благодаря  хорошему сервису, она обладает широким кругом клиентов. Ее клиенты женщины со вкусом и очень трудно их удовлетворять, но Рафоат с легкостью справляется с их капризами. Она нуждается новых видов тканей, но ее доход не позволяет ей купить это. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  1500 сомони для покупки тканей. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en:
A virtuoso seamstress needs your support. Rafoat is an experienced seamstress who excels at sewing traditional Tajik dresses.
She is 28 years old. She is divorced and raising a child. In order to support her family, she launched her own business two years ago. Thanks to her good service, she has acquired a large customer base. Her customers are women with a very demanding taste, but Rafoat easily manages to satisfy their whims. She needs a new range of  fabrics,   but her income is insufficient. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,500 TJS in order to buy fabric. She is counting on you and your kindness.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Duterimbere Kzh Group

texts.fr:
Aniceth est membre du groupe solidaire DUTERIMBERE KZH. Il est marié et a 38 ans. Il a 4 enfants, le plus âgé a 11 ans et le moins âgé a 4 ans. Trois de ses enfants vont à l’école et aucune autre personne n’est en sa charge.
Il est né au Rwanda et son niveau d’éducation est de 8 ans de l’éducation primaire.
Il a débuté de collaborer avec ACB Ltd en 2012. Le cycle actuel est le premier pour lui.
Avec ce crédit, il va acheter 65 kilos d’engrais chimiques, et le reste paiera la main d’œuvre.
Il n’attend aucune difficulté de non remboursement.
Etant l’agriculteur du riz, Monsieur Aniceth a l’ambition d’être le meilleur cultivateur du riz dans le pays. Pour sa famille, il va assurer l’éducation de ses enfants ainsi que les soins médicaux.
texts.en:
Aniceth is a member of the solidarity group DUTERIMBERE KZH. He is married and is 38 years old. He has 4 children. The oldest is 11 years old and the youngest is 4 years old. Three of his children go to school and he has no other dependents.

He was born in Rwanda and his level of education is 8 years of primary school.

He started collaborating with ACB Ltd. in 2012. The current cycle is his first.

With this loan he is going to buy 65 kg of chemical fertilizers, and the rest will pay for manual labor.

He doesn't expect any difficulties repaying the loan.

As a rice farmer, Aniceth has the ambition to be the best rice farmer in the country. For his family, he is going to ensure his children's education as well as their medical care.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers (65 kg) and pay for manual labor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Boniface

texts.fr: Boniface est une jeune Camerounais âgé de 34 ans qui mène comme activité la vente des vêtements dans un marché de la ville depuis 15 ans déjà. il bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. il voudrait avec ce crédit acheter des ballots de vêtements pour renforcer son stock de marchandise afin de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. les revenus générés lui permettront de mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Il a pour ambition d'ouvrir une boutique.
texts.en: Boniface is a young Cameroonian who is 34 years ago. He has been managing a business selling clothing in a market of the city for 15 years already. He benefits from good experience in this field. With this loan he would like to buy bundles of clothing to strengthen his stock of merchandise in order to better satisfy his clientèle. The income generated will allow him to better meet the needs of his family. His ambition is to open a store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (bundles of clothing).

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela, de 38 años, es una mujer alegre y amable. Vive en su casa propia junto a su conviviente Antonio, quien es obrero de construcción civil. Tienen 3 hijos de 14, 8 y 3 años a quienes quiere darles una buena calidad de vida. El trabajo de Graciela consiste en  diseño, confección  y venta de ropas para damas, caballeros y niños. Realiza esta actividad en un local en el interior de su vivienda y ya lleva 4 años ejerciendo. Comenta, que se inicio en esta actividad, debido a la necesidad de conseguir un empleo y una amiga le enseñó a diseñar y confeccionar para que pueda emprender en este rubro. Considera rentable éxte negocio, porque las empresas solicitan sus servicios para que haga los uniformes de sus obreros, también lleva a vender sus confecciones al mercado de la ciudad para venderlo al por mayor. Espera en el futuro poner una tienda en el mercado dela ciudad para poder vender sus confecciones. Por tanto olicitará 1,000 mil soles para compara mercadería, como telas, elasticos, blondas e hilos, así obtendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Graciela, 38, is a cheerful, gracious woman.  She lives in her own house with her spouse, Antonio, who works in civil construction.  They have three children who are 14, 8 and 3 years old and who they want to provide with a good quality of life.  Graciela’s work consists in designing, sewing and selling women’s, men’s and children’s clothes.  She does this work in a space at home and has been doing it for four years.  She comments that she started this activity because she needed a job and a girlfriend taught her to design and dew so that she could go into this line of work.  She considers it to be profitable because firms request her services to make uniforms for their employees.  She also sells her creations in one of the city markets at wholesale.  She hopes in future to open a store in the city market to sell her creations.  She will request a 1,000 sol loan to buy merchandise like fabric, elastic, lace trim and thread to earn higher profits.

loans.use: to buy fabric, elastic, lace trim and thread.

loans.name: Mame Meissa

texts.fr: Mame Meissa est une femme mariée qui évolue dans le secteur de la pêche depuis plus de 20 ans. Elle vit dans une des localités sénégalaises  et est membre  du guichet de l’UIMCEC  de la meme zone. Les revenus que lui procurent ses pirogues lui permettent de s’occuper de ses besoins personnels mais aussi de participer dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’une autre pirogue dans le but d’accroitre encore davantage ses revenus. Elle souhaite devenir dans le futur une grande promotrice de pêche  qui s’active dans l’achat et la vente de machines et pirogues de pêche.
texts.en: Mame Meissa is a married woman who has been progressing in the fishing sector for more than 20 years. She lives in a Senegalese locale and is a member of the branch of the UIMCEC in the same zone. The income that her dugout canoes bring in allows her to take care of her personal needs and also to participate in the management of daily expenses. She is requesting a loan of 500,000 frs for the purchase of another dugout canoe with the goal of growing her income even more. In the future she wishes to become a great promoter of fishing who buys and sells fishing machines and dugout canoes.

loans.use: to buy a dugout canoe.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: María, de 62 años, es una mujer cordial y emprendedora. Su esposo falleció hace unos días atrás desde entonces vive en su casa propia sola, pues sus hijos son independientes y viven en otras ciudades con sus respectivas familias. El trabajo de María consiste en la confección y venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. Realiza esta actividad en un local en el interior de su vivienda y ya lleva 8 años en esta actividad. Comenta que se  inicio en esta actividad desde muy joven, porque siempre le gustó diseñar y confeccionar. Su mamá la motivo para que se dedique a este trabaj ahoa lo realiza junto a unas amigas con quienes ha formado una sociedad. Considera rentable porque las empresas solicitan sus servicios para que hagan los uniformes de sus obreros, también lleva a vender sus confecciones al mercado de la ciudad a vender al por mayor. Espera en el futuro poner una tienda en el mercado para poder vender sus confecciones. Por tanto solicita 2,000 soles para comprar materiales como telas, blondas, elásticos, hilos para seguir confeccionando  y produciendo ya que tiene muchos pedidos  para hacer  vestuarios para las fiestas de fin de año.
texts.en:
María, who is 62 years old, is a friendly and enterprising woman.  Her husband passed away recently, and since then she has been living alone in her house.  Her children are independent and live in other cities with their respective families.  

María's work consists of the tailoring and sale of clothes for women, men and children.  She works in a space inside her home, and has been doing it for 8 years.  She says she began sewing when she was very young, because she always liked to design and sew.  Her mother motivated her to do this type of work for a living.  Now she does it with some friends with whom she has formed a company.  She considers it profitable because businesses solicit her services to make uniforms for their workers.  She also takes her fashions to the market in the city to sell wholesale.  

In the future, she hopes to have her own store in the market to sell her fashions.  Therefore, she is requesting 2,000 soles to buy materials such as fabric, lace, elastic and thread to continue sewing and producing, since she already has a lot of orders to make outfits for the end-of-year parties.

loans.use: to buy fabric, lace, elastic and thread.

loans.name: Matar

texts.fr: Monsieur Matar habite au Sénégal. Il est employé depuis plus de cinq ans  comme vigile dans un hôtel de la place. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC ou il a déjà remboursé 4 crédits antérieurs. Il est marié et père de 5 enfants âgés entre 2 et 12 ans. Il sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour la réfection de la terrasse  de sa maison.  Son objectif est de rénover sa maison afin d’améliorer le cadre de vie de sa famille. En plus il souhaite disposer d’une agence de gardiennage dans le futur.
texts.en: Matar lives in Sénégal. He has been employed for more than five years as a watchman in a local hotel. He is a member of one of the branches of the UIMCEC to which he has already reimbursed 4 previous loans. He is married and father to 5 children aged from 2 to 12 years old. He is requesting a loan of 150,000 frs to repair the terrace of his home. His goal is to renovate his home in order to improve the living conditions of his family. In addition he wishes to have a guarding agency in the future.

loans.use: to repair the terrace of his home.

loans.name: Osmin

texts.es: Osmin vive junto a su familia, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que permite obtener las mejores cosechas, además cuando no cultiva para complementar los gastos del hogar vende pescado y tamales, el terreno de siembra esta ubicado en un lugar de alto potencial agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo el producto es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; Osmin es un hombre entregado a su labor, luchador día a día se esfuerza por salir adelante sabe que solo con esfuerzo y constancia logrará  el éxito que tanto desea, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aprovechar y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herramientas, pescado, tamales etc. Osmin tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Osmin lives with his family.  He is a farmer, raises corn and beans, and has been doing this for a number of years.  He has lots of experience that allows him to have better harvests.  In order to pay the household expenses, he also sells fish and tamales when he is not farming.  His farmland is located in a highly agricultural location and he sells all around the community.  He has many customers who prefer to buy from him because of the good quality, prices, and service he offers.

Osmin is a hardworking man dedicated to his work.  Each day he makes a great effort to get ahead because he knows that this is the way he will succeed the way he wants to.  He wants to take advantage of a new investment during this planting season but he needs capital, so he has requested a loan through INTEGRAL.  This will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, fish, tamales, etc.  Osmin has a good payment history and knows that he can repay this loan and provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and seeds.

loans.name: Nito

texts.en:
Nito is 24 years old and in his third year studying animal science at the Instituto Superior Politecnica de Manica (ISPM), an agricultural training college near Chimoio in Mozambique.  His father died in war, his mother is disabled, and he has four brothers and one sister, so he must rely on himself to earn a living and help provide for his family.  Most of his brothers are in the army, but Nito always dreamed of working in agriculture.  

When he was unable to get into his local university, Nito started working for the local municipality, but he did not see his life improving.  One day he saw an advertisement to study animal science at ISPM and applied for and was accepted to their three-year scholarship program.  With the loan, Nito will plant 3-5 hectares of maize, soya and cowpeas.  The loan will also pay for the mentorship of a local experienced farmer and weather insurance. He will use the profits to pay for his fourth and final year of university. Nito hopes to be a self-employed farmer and employ other people in the area to help the local economy.

loans.use: to purchase maize, soya, and cowpea seeds, fertilizer, and other inputs

loans.name: Helder

texts.en:
Helder is 23 years old and a second-year student at the Instituto Superior Politecnica de Manica (ISPM), an agricultural training college near Chimoio in Mozambique.  His parents are subsistence farmers and have six sons and two daughters, so they cannot afford to pay for school.  Helder was able to get a scholarship to ISPM for the first two years, but he will need to pay for the final two years.

With the loan, Helder will plant 3-5 hectares of maize, soya and cowpeas. He hopes to use the profits he earns to pay for his remaining university fees and also to help his family. He sees farming as a good way to make a living and also to help the people in his community by providing them with food. One day, Helder would like to be a self-employed farmer who is known for his good farming skills.

loans.use: to purchase maize, soya, and cowpea seeds, fertilizer, and other inputs

loans.name: Leonel

texts.en:
Leonel is 20 years old and in his second year studying animal science at the Instituto Superior Politecnica de Manica (ISPM), an agricultural training college near Chimoio in Mozambique. Leonel is an orphan, has two brothers, and currently lives with his grandmother in Chimoio. He originally wanted to study civil engineering but didn’t have enough money to pay for the courses. He eventually got a scholarship to study agriculture and is now happy, as he enjoys his studies and appreciates the support of the lecturers.

With the loan, Leonel will plant 6-10 hectares of maize, soya and cowpeas. With the profits he earns, he hopes to pay for his fourth and final year of university, which is not covered by the scholarship, and to also help his grandmother by buying inputs for her small plot of land.  Leonel knows that a university education will help him to develop the skills he needs to be a successful producer. His ambition is to own his own farm and to rear animals.  Leonel dreams big – he wants to be the best producer in his area and to supply the whole country.

loans.use: to purchase maize, soya, and cowpea seeds, fertilizer, and other inputs

loans.name: Ismael

texts.en:
Ismael is 20 years old and a second-year student on scholarship at the Instituto Superior Politecnica de Manica (ISPM), an agricultural training college near Chimoio in Mozambique.  Since Ismael was little he grew carrots, cabbage, and fruits and always wanted to study agriculture and learn new techniques. His mother’s side of the family are all farmers, but they are encountering difficulties with aging equipment.

With the loan, Ismael will plant 6-10 hectares of maize, soya, and cowpeas on part of the university’s farm plot. He hopes to use the profits to pay for his fourth and final year of university, which is not part of the scholarship, and to also develop a small piece of land he currently owns. He wants to eventually have his own agricultural business where he can help people who do not have an education by training them in agriculture.

loans.use: to purchase maize, soya, and cowpea seeds, fertilizer, and other inputs

loans.name: Mussa

texts.en:
Mussa is 24 years old and a third-year student at the Instituto Superior Politecnica de Manica (ISPM), an agricultural training college near Chimoio in Mozambique.  Mussa’s widowed mother provides for his two brothers, two sisters, and him through subsistence farming, but she does not make enough money for school fees.  Mussa had always wanted to go to school and originally wanted to study Mathematics, but he was only offered a scholarship for the agriculture program.  He learned quickly, however, that he had talent at farming and could make a good living doing so.  He earned $100 through his first practical experience growing peppers on a small plot.

With this loan, Mussa will be able to plant 10 hectares of maize, soya, and cowpeas on part of the university’s farm plot.  He plans to use the profits he earns to pay for his fourth and final year of university, which is not covered under the scholarship, and to invest in increasing the area of land he cultivates next year. One day, Mussa hopes to own his own farm and equipment.

loans.use: to purchase maize, soya, and cowpea seeds, fertilizer, and other inputs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy items made from wood, such as kitchen utensils

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora Alicia de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica a al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda;  comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija que la prefiere por la calidad, buenos precios y excelente servicio; Dora es una mujer activa, enérgica y dedicada a su labor siempre esta buscando las mejores alternativas que le abran camino al éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo; en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvieron algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, maicillo, abono, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Dora Alicia tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dora Alicia, 34, lives with her partner and her children. She works growing corn, beans, and sorghum. She has been working in this sector for many years and this has given her a lot of experience which allows her to have better harvests. The land she works is located in a very agricultural area and very close to her home. She trades in the areas surrounding her community and she has a lot of steady customers who prefer her for the quality, good prices and excellent service.

Dora is an active and energetic woman who is dedicated to her work. She is always looking for alternatives that will open the door to success and she will not give up until she achieves it. In the last planting season, they had some losses and she wants to recover from that. That is why she is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn, bean, and sorghum seeds, as well as manure, insecticide, herbicide, etc. Dora Alicia has good payment references. She is sure she will be able to pay off the loan and she is also confident that it will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seed for corn, beans, sorghum, as well as manure, insecticide, and herbicide.

loans.name: Retina

texts.es: Retiña, de 28 años es una mujer amable y soñadora. Vive en su casa propia junto a su conviviente miguel quien trabaja como conductor de tractores y maquinas pesadas. Tienen 2 hijos de 11 y 2 años, piensan darles una buena educación. El trabajo de Retiña consiste en la venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, harina, huevos. Este trabajo lo realiza en un local en el  interior de su vivienda propia, pero también vende sus productos en las comunidades alrededor de la ciudad. Lleva 6 años en este negocio, pero cuando tenía 18 años ayudaba a su mamá atender en su negocio, de ahí tuvo la idea de tener  su propia actividad económica. Su conviviente la ayuda hacer las compras para abastecer  su negocio y en la atención de los clientes. Comenta que su trabajo es rentable porque tiene muchos clientes. Además como compra al por mayor obtiene ganancias positivas. Comenta que antes de empezar con este negocio, no contaba con local propio y tenía que trasladarse de un lugar a otro, entonces decidió alquilar un establecimiento en una avenida muy transitable. Para el futuro quiere construir un local presentable y cómodo para dar mejor atención de sus clientes e incrementar sus ganancias. Por tanto solicita 3,000 soles, lo utilizará para comprar mercadería, que será en la capital por intermedio de su amiga, que vive ahí.
texts.en:
Retiña is 28 years old and a friendly woman with dreams for the future. She lives in her own house with her partner Miguel, who works driving tractors and  heavy equipment. They have two children, ages 11 and 2. They intend to give them a good education. 

Retiña's work is selling basic household necessities, such as rice, sugar, flour and eggs. She does this work in a shop located in her own home, but also sells her products in communities around the city.

She has been in this business for six years, but when she was 18 she helped her mother run her store, and from there she had the idea of having her own livelihood. Her partner helps her make the purchases for stocking her store and helps serve customers. She says that her work is profitable because she has many customers.

In addition, as she buys at wholesale, she gets good earnings. She says that before beginning this business, she didn't have her own shop, and had to move from place to place. Then she decided to rent an establishment on a very busy street.

In the future she wants to build a well-ordered and comfortable shop, so that she can give better service to her customers and increase her earnings. Therefore, she is applying for 3000 soles which she will use to buy merchandise, which she will do in the capital through her friend who lives there.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, pulses, canned goods and pasta.

loans.name: Eben Ezer 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 Group

texts.fr:
Gislaine est la coordonatrice de son groupe Eben ezer 1, 2, 3 4 & 5. Elle habite dans la région de Ouanaminthe d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Elle est célibataire et elle n'a pas d'enfants. 

Gislaine a dirigé son commerce de produits divers pendant les 6 dernières années. Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à plus de produits. Des autres membres du groupe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour faire du commerce comme vendre des produits alimentaires, charbon et des produits cosmetique. Gislaine dit que son rêve est d’agrandir son commerce et ayant une entreprise prospère.
texts.en:
Gislaine is the coordinator of her group, Eben ezer 1, 2, 3 4 & 5. She lives in the Ouanaminthe region of Haiti, where electricity is rare and water is very limited. She is single and has no children.

Gislaine has been selling diverse products for the last six years. She would like to use this loan to invest in more products. Other members of the group need a loan to sell food products, charcoal, and cosmetic products. Gislaine says that her dream is to grow her business and have a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothes, cosmetics, etc

loans.name: Ashobuddin

texts.ru:
Асхобуддин житель города Душанбе. Ему 23 года. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Асхобуддин живет с матерью и женой. Его жена домохозяйка. А мать портниха. Асхобуддин шафер. На сегодняшний день он занимается частным извозом. Он предоставляет услугу, такси по маршруту №3 по центральной дороге города. В этой области он пять лет. 
Асхобуддин берет кредит для ремонта машины, в основном для установки оборудования для природного газа.
texts.en: Ashobuddin is a resident of the city of Dushanbe.  He is 23 years old, married and has one child.  Ashobuddin lives with his mother and wife.  His wife is a homemaker, and mother is a seamstress.  Ashobuddin is a driver.  Today, he is involved in private transportation.  He provides a taxi service along the route #3 on the central city road.  He has been in this business for five years.  Ashobuddin is requesting this loan to repair his car, primarily to install equipment for natural gas.

loans.use: repair his car, primarily to install equipment for natural gas

loans.name: Abdou

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdou est agriculteur depuis 12 ans maintenant. Il loge dans un village situé à environ 22 km de la ville principale. Il s’est spécialisé dans le maraichage et vient solliciter un crédit pour renforcer son activité. Il va acheter des intrants agricoles (gasoil, engrais, fumier) pour l’exploitation de son espace cultural. Abdou est marié mais ne fait que participer  aux dépenses quotidiennes. Abdou voudrai exploiter d’autres périmètres s’il a les moyens avec  l’appui de l’IMCEC.
texts.en: Mr. Abdou has been a farmer for twelve years. He lives in a village located about 22 km from the main city. He specializes in truck farming and is seeking a loan to strengthen his business. He is going to buy farming products (diesel oil, fertilizer, manure) for the cultivation of his space. Abdou is married and contributes to the daily expenses. Abdou would like to cultivate other plots if he has the means with the help of IMCEC.

loans.use: to buy farming products (diesel oil, fertilizer, manure)

loans.name: Yulissa

texts.es:
Yulissa de 25 años, es una madre soltera. Tiene 2 hijos de 3 años y un pequeño de 6 meses de nacido. Habita una casa alquilada en un distrito de la selva central.

Yulissa es una joven emprendedora. Desde 10 años  se dedica a la compra y venta de huevos y las distribuye hacia tiendas o bodegas. Para ello cuenta con una moto, con la que realiza dichos repartos. 
Hace podo tenía problemas para realizar su actividad ya que había dado a luz a su último hijo, por ello sus hermanas la apoyan en su trabajo.
Ahora que está más repuesta continúa con su labor.
“El trabajo es rentable, cada bandeja de huevos la compro a 12 soles, y las ofrezco a 16, y si es en cantidades mayores, la ganancia aumenta”, menciona.
Ella desea, no solo vender huevos, sino también otros productos, pero le falta dinero para adquirir su mercadería. Éste mes es importante en la venta de huevos, por ello requiere de su apoyo y no dejar pasar ésta oportunidad. Éste es su crédito número 3 con MFP. Se siente contenta por el apoyo brindado en todo éste tiempo. Además menciona que sus actividades con su banco comunal “Luz y Verdad”, es gratificante por ser un equipo responsable.
Con el dinero podrá adquirir más bandejas de huevos, para atender sus pedidos, y bastecer más tiendas y bodegas.
texts.en:
Yulissa is 25 years old and single mother. She has two children: a 3 year old, and a little one who is six months old. She lives in a rented house in a district in the central tropical forest.

Yulissa is an enterprising young woman. For 10 years she has bought and sold eggs, and distributed them to shops and grocery stores. For this, she has a motorcycle which she uses for these deliveries.

A little while ago she had problems carrying out her work as she had given birth to her youngest child. For this reason, her sisters help her with her work. Now that she has more strength, she is continuing with her work.

"The work is profitable. I buy each tray of eggs for 12 soles, and sell it for 16; and if the quantities are greater, the profit increases," she says.

She wishes not only to sell eggs, but also other products. But she needs money to acquire her merchandise. This month is important for egg sales, so she needs support, so as not to let this opportunity pass by. 

This is her third loan with MFP, and she feels happy for the support she has received all this time. In addition she says that her activities with the "Luz y Verdad" communal bank are rewarding because it is a responsible team.

With the money, she will be able to acquire more trays of eggs to deal with her orders, and supply more shops and grocery stores.

loans.use: To buy trays of eggs.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.ru: Хайдар житель города Исфара. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него трое детей. Хайдар вместе с женой предоставляет услугу. У него имеется собственная пекарня, где он печет лепешки. В этой области Хайдар пять лет. Он берет кредит для покупки муки, чтобы запастись на зиму.
texts.en: Haydar is a resident of the city of Isfara.  He is 41 years old, married and has three children.  Haydar and his wife provide a service.  He owns a bakery, where he bakes flatbread.  Haydar has been in this business for five years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase flour in order to stock up for the winter.

loans.use: to purchase flour in order to stock up for the winter

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлюда 36 лет, замужем. Мать 4 детей.  . Сейчас Мавлюда занимается реализацией женской одежды на местном рынке Кара-Суу. Свой бизнес она начала с 50,000 KGS сом два года назад.Ежемесячный доход Мавлюда составляет около 20.000 - 25,000 сом KGS. Муж Мавлюды работает водителем. Мавлюда имеет среднее образование, создает впечатление человека очень честного и целеустремленного. На сегодняшний день у нее в обороте 150,000 KGS и за это время она смогла отремонтировать дом и построить времянку. Все что она добилась благодаря её трудолюбию. В целях дальнейшего расширения своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товарооборота за счет покупки зимнего ассортимента утепленных вещей. Мавлюда планирует развивать свой бизнес, увеличивать доход семьи, для того чтобы обеспечить нормальное будущее своим детям.
texts.en: Mavluda is 36 years old, married and a mother of four children.  Currently, she is involved in selling women's clothing at the local Kara-Suu market.  She started her business with 50,000 KGS two years ago.  Mavluda's monthly income amounts to about 20,000-25,000 KGS.  Mavluda's husband works as a driver.  Mavluda has a secondary education and appears to be a very honest and goal-oriented person.  Today, she has a working capital of 150,000 KGS and was able to repair her house and build a temporary place during this time.  She achieved everything thanks to her love of hard work.  In order to further expand her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to increase goods turnover by purchasing a winter selection of warm clothing.  Mavluda plans to develop her business and increase her family's income in order to provide a normal future for her children.

loans.use: to increase goods turnover by purchasing a winter selection of warm clothing

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Muhiddin

texts.ru: Мухиддин житель города Исфара. Он женат. Ему 37 лет. У него трое детей. Жена Мухиддина работает в ВУЗе, преподавателем. Сам Мухидин занимается купле – продажей сухофруктов. Этим видом деятельности он занимается восемь лет. Он берет кредит для покупки нескольких видов сухофруктов, чтобы заняться оптовой реализацией.
texts.en: Muhiddin is a resident of the city of Isfara.  He is 37 years old, married and has three children.  Muhiddin's wife works as a teacher at a university.  Muhiddin is involved in buying and selling dried fruits.  He has been in this business for eight years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase several types of dried fruits in order to get involved in wholesale sales.

loans.use: to purchase several types of dried fruits in order to get involved in wholesale sales

loans.name: Toliba

texts.ru: Толиба проживает в районе Спитамен. Ей 38 лет. Он замужем. У нее трое детей. Она занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности Толиба занимается пятнадцать лет. Она берет кредит для закупа бычков с целью увеличения поголовья крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Toliba lives in the Spitamen district.  She is 38 years old, married and has three children.  She is involved in animal husbandry.  Toliba has been in this business for fifteen years.  She is requesting this loan to buy bulls in order to increase cattle headcount.

loans.use: to buy bulls in order to increase cattle headcount

loans.name: Henri

texts.fr:
Henri est un jeune Camerounais âgé de 28 ans, marié et père de 02 enfants âgés de 01 et 05 ans. il convient de préciser que ce dernier va déjà à l'école.
Henri a en plus à charge 02 autres personnes qui vont également à l'école. Comme activité, il gère un centre d'appel téléphonique communément appelé "call box" depuis 04 ans déjà. ceci dit il bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine, ce qui lui a permit de constituer un portefeuille clientèle considérable et fidèle. 
il voudrait avec ce crédit acheter en gros les crédits de communication pour éviter des ruptures afin de pouvoir  satisfaire sa clientèle à tout moment. les revenus générés lui permettront de mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Henri is a young, 28-year-old Cameroonian and a married father of two children, ages 1 – 5. It is worth mentioning that the eldest attends school. Henri is also responsible for two other children who attend school. For work, he has been managing a calling center called Call Box for four years. He is doing well in this domain, which has allowed him to build up a considerable and faithful clientele. He would like to use this loan to buy at wholesale communication credits to avoid breaks in order to be able to satisfy his clientele at any moment. The profits generated will allow him to better meet the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy communication credits

loans.name: Anara

texts.ru: Анаркан 50 лет, замужем, имеет 1 сына. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Анаркан начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством. Начатое с 2,000 KGS  в 1994 году,  хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов,мясных продуктов и полеводства. На сегодня, ее хозяйство насчитывает 6 голов КРС. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анаркан обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку КРС. Доходы Анаркан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнес – деятельности за счет увеличение КРС.
texts.en: Anara is 50 years old, married and has one son.  To provide a source of income for her family, she became involved in animal husbandry and farming.  The business, started with 2,000 KGS in 1994, now yields about 5,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and meat products and farming.  Today, her business contains six cows.  In order to further develop her business, Anara requested a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy cattle.  She plans to invest the earnings into a further expansion of her business by increasing the quantities of cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Bahodir

texts.ru: Баходир проживает в городе Худжанд. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Баходира портниха, мать пенсионерка. Баходир занимается животноводством. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности Баходир занимается пятнадцать лет. Он берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота и корма.
texts.en: Bahodir lives in the city of Khujand.  He is 43 years old, married and has three children.  Bahodir's wife is a seamstress, and his mother is a retiree.  Bahodir is involved in animal husbandry.  He earns a living by breeding cattle.  Bahodir has been in this business for fifteen years.  He is requesting this loan to buy cattle and livestock feed.

loans.use: to buy cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Bahridin

texts.ru: Бахридин занимается животноводством. Он разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Бахридин в основном закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. В этот раз он берет кредит для закупа бычков с целью увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en: Bahridin is involved in animal husbandry.  He breeds cattle at home.  Bahridin primarily buys livestock for subsequent resale.  This time, he is requesting a loan to buy bulls in order to increase livestock headcount.

loans.use: to buy bulls in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Maranatha De Samarie Group

texts.fr:
Mireille est la coordinatrice de son groupe Maranatha de Samarie. Elle habite dans la région de Samarie d’Haïti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Elle a dirigé son commerce de vente de Produit Divers pendant les 7 dernières années. Elle est marie et elle a fils.

Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l'achat de divers produits tels que les chaussures, cosmétiques, produits de nettoyage. Des autres membres du groupe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre des produits alimentaires, cosmétiques, vêtements, chaussureset du charbon. Mireille dit que son défi principal est en mesure de vendre plus depuis la crise économique en Haïti ne reçoit pas beaucoup d'argent.
texts.en:
Mireille is the coordinator of her group, Maranatha de Samarie. She lives in the region of Samarie in Haiti, where electricity is rarely available and the water supply extremely limited. Mireille has been managing a business selling various products for the past seven years. She is married and has a son.

Mireille would like to use this loan to purchase various items such as shoes, cosmetics and cleaning products. Other members of the group need a loan to help with their businesses, in which they sell items such as food products, cosmetics, clothing, shoes and charcoal. Mireille says that her main challenge is to be able to sell more; since the economic crisis in Haiti, there has not been much money.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Cursina

texts.es:
Cursina de 55 años, es una mujer soltera. Vive en la casa de su hija en un distrito de la selva central.
Cursina es una mujer laboriosa. Desde que sus hijos se independizaron empezó a trabajar con esmero en su taller de carpintería. 
Lleva más de 15 años en esta actividad. Empezó fabricando pequeños muebles como mesas, sillas, cómodas y otros. Con los años de experiencia consiguió contratar personas quienes la ayudan a construir carrocerías de camiones, y muebles más grandes.
“El negocio es rentable, más aún si son muebles y carrocerías, se gana muy bien”, menciona orgullosa de sus logros.
Se siente contenta trabajando con sus compañeras porque así cree que sus metas pueden lograrse con facilidad.
Sus metas próximas son ampliar su negocio, para ello necesita adquirir más materia prima. Por eso solicita de su apoyo. Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP. Se siente contenta por el apoyo anterior y por la oportunidad de pertenecer a un banco comunal “Rosas y Claveles”, muy unido. Menciona que pagará las cuotas con puntualidad.
Invertirá el dinero en la compra de maderas de los árboles: Nogal, Cedro, Moena y Roble, que son las más utilizadas en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Cursina is 55 years old. She is single and lives in her daughter's house, located in the central jungle district.

She is a very hardworking woman. For the last 15 years, since her children became independent, Cursina has worked painstakingly in her carpentry workshop. She started out making furniture such as tables, chairs, and dressers. With years of experience, she was able to contract workers to help her to build truck bodies and other bigger pieces of furniture. 

"This business is profitable, even more so for furniture and coachwork, which earn a lot," says the proud owner of her accomplishments. Cursina is very happy to work alongside those she does because she believes they help her to accomplish her goals more easily. Her next goal is to expand her business, which she needs more raw materials to do. That is why she is requesting this loan. Cursina will invest this money to purchase wood from a variety of trees that she uses most often in her work: oak, cedar, walnut, and moena.

This is Cursina's second loan from MFP. She pledges to make her repayments punctually. She is very happy to have their support and the opportunity to belong to the tight-knit communal bank "Rosas y Claveles" (Roses and Carnations).

loans.use: to buy wood from various trees: walnut, cedar, and oak, and moena (found in Peru)

loans.name: Firdavs

texts.ru: Фирдавс 27 - летний женатый мужчина проживающий в районе Хамадони. Он занимается животноводством. Фирдавс в основном занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается почти год. Фирдавс берет кредит для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Fidras is a 27 year-old man who lives Hamadoni. He works in animal husbandry. Fidras mainly breeds cattle, and has been doing this type of work for almost a year. Fidras is requesting a loan to purchase some bulls and calves.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and calves.

loans.name: Dilnoza

texts.ru: Дилноза трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Потому что она выросла в хорошей семье. Благодаря родителям, она получила среднее образование и хорошее воспитание. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. С детства она любила шить и поэтому, повзрослев, она стала портнихой. Дилноза мастер своего дела и умеет шить с собственным дизайном. Это прекрасная портниха решила реализовать свое ремесло в сфере бизнеса и получать от этого доход. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес услугой портнихи, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она будет открывать свой швейный цех не далеко от своего дома. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  5000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Если она будет получать доход от бизнеса, то будет использовать для улучшения условия проживания. Будущим она имеет очень большие планы и есть на это вероятность, что она станет успешной бизнес леди. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dilnoza is hardworking and kind woman, because she grew up in a good family. Thanks to her parents, she received a high school education and a good upbringing. She is married and is raising one child. She has loved to sew ever since she was little, and so when she grew up, she became a dressmaker. Dilnoza runs her own business and knows how to sew her own designs. This outstanding dressmaker decided to take her trade into the commercial sphere and earn a living from it. With this goal in mind, she took a course organized by the Association of Businesswomen entitled "Achieve Success", and received a certificate. Now she is fully able to organize her own business and become successful. She wants to organize a dressmaking service, since she has experience in this area. She is going to open her own sewing shop near her home. She is asking for a loan in the amount of 5000 somonis to purchase a sewing machine to start the new business. If the business makes money, she will use it to improve her living conditions. She has big plans for the future, and it is certain that she will become a successful business woman. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for organizing a new business

loans.name: Verónica Alexandra

texts.es:
La Sra. Verónica es una persona joven con gran valentía para enfrentar los desafíos, ella se define como una persona humilde, honrada, luchadora que ama a su única hija de 11 años, ella trabaja con su hermana, una chica joven, la cual sale en la foto de impacto.  Juntas buscan la manera de salir adelante y de mejorar su calidad de vida

El crédito solicitado a Fodemi se lo empleara en la adecuación del restaurante y en la compra de productos como arroz, papas, aceite que son necesarios para la preparación de desayunos. Almuerzos y meriendas que verónica ofrece a sus clientes. 


El sueño que la Sra. Verónica tiene es el tener un restaurante mucho más grande, con cocinas industriales, verónica esta consiente que cumplir su sueño es posible, pero para cumplirlo tiene que trabajar día a día, la motivación para cumplir este sueño es ver a su hija crecer.
texts.en:
Verónica is a young person with great courage to face challenges.  She defines herself as a humble, honest and determined person who loves her only daughter who is 11 years old.  She works with her sister, a young girl, who appears in the snapshot.  Together they look for the way to get ahead and to improve their quality of life.

The loan requested from Fodemi will be employed in the upgrading of the restaurant and in the purchase of products like rice, potatoes and oil that are necessary for the preparation of breakfast, lunch and snacks that Verónica offers her customers.

Verónica’s dream is to have a much larger restaurant with industrial kitchens.  She is conscious that to fulfill her dream is possible but in order to do so she has to work day by day.  The motivation for fulfilling this dream is seeing her daughter grow up.

loans.use: to invest in upgrading her restaurant and to purchase necessary products such as "quintales" (100 lbs.) of rice, potatoes and oils.

loans.name: Djiby

texts.fr: Monsieur Djiby  qui loge à environ 22 km de la ville principale, s’active dans l’agriculture depuis plus de 10 ans. C’est un jeune célibataire  très actif qui vit de son activité. Il vient tout juste d’ouvrir un compte pour pouvoir bénéficier d’un crédit qui lui permettra d’acheter une moto pompe de marque ROC  afin d’améliorer son activité de maraichage. Avec les revenus de son activité il peut appuyer aux charges de la maison et à la dépense quotidienne. Il a comme ambition, d’acheter d’autres motopompes dans le cadre de toujours maximiser son profit.
texts.en: Djiby, who lives about 22 km from the main city, has been a farmer for more than 10 years. This is a very active young single man who lives off his business. He just opened an account to be able to benefit from a loan which will allow him to buy a ROC brand motor-pump in order to improve his market gardening business. With the income from his business he can support the responsibilities of the home and the daily expenses. His ambition is to buy other motor-pumps within the framework of always maximizing his profits.

loans.use: to buy a motor-pump for his market gardening business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy books.

loans.name: Anith

texts.es:
Anith, de 40 años, es una mujer  alegre, soñadora y emprendedora. Vive en su casa propia junto a su hijo de 15 años a quien quiere dar una buena educación y mejor calidad de vida.
El trabajo de Anith consiste en  el diseño, confección  y venta de ropas para damas, caballeros y niños. Realiza esta actividad en un local en el interior de su vivienda, y ya lleva 12 años ejerciendo esta actividad. Comenta que se inicio a este trabajo debido a la necesidad de generar ingresos económicos para solventar los gastos de los estudios de su hijo. Ahora lo realiza junto a unas amigas a quienes contrata cada vez que tiene pedidos en grandes cantidades. Considera rentable éste negocio, pues las empresas solicitan sus servicios en la confección de uniformes para sus trabajadores, asimismo tiene contratos con los distintos colegios de la ciudad. Ella para emprender tuvo que solicitar un crédito a la institución bancaria, con este dinero compró su primera maquina de coser. Espera en el futuro abrir un taller que se dedique a la confección de vestidos de novia. Por tanto éste será su préstamo número 15 con la institución MFP, tiene ganas de seguir siendo puntual en su cuotas, porque le esta yendo muy bien. Con el monto solicitado de 3,000 soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales como telas, blondas, elásticos, hilos para seguir confeccionando y  produciendo; también comprará una remalladora para el acabado de sus confecciones.
texts.en:
Anith is 40 years old and a cheerful, ambitious, and enterprising woman. She lives in her own home with her 15-year-old son, for whom she wants to provide a good education and a better quality of life. Anith works as a designer and seamstress who sells clothing for women, men, and children. She operates her business from a workshop in her home. Anith has been managing her business for 12 years. She says that she started in this line of work because she needed to generate income to pay for her son’s educational expenses. Anith now works with a few friends she hires whenever she receives several large orders. She believes her business is profitable since companies request her sewing services whenever they need employee uniforms. Anith also has contracts with various schools within the city. She started her business by requesting a loan from a financial institution. Anith used the money to buy her first sewing machine. In the future, she hopes to open a shop that is dedicated to making wedding gowns.

This will be her 15th loan with MFP. She wants to continue being punctual with her loan payments, which explains why she is doing very well. The loan she requested in the amount of 3,000 PEN will be invested in the purchase of materials such as fabrics, lace, elastics, and thread so that she can continue sewing and producing. Anith will also buy a stitching machine for adding the finishing touches to her designs.

loans.use: to buy a stitching machine, fabrics, lace, elastics, and thread.

loans.name: Tohirjon

texts.en: Tohirjon is married and has four children. He is a person who always tries to earn money in order to provide a better life to his children. Tohirjon began his own business dealing in animal husbandry seven years ago. He has requested a loan in the amount of 500 USD to increase the number of animals he has for sale. He hopes for Kiva's cooperation in this loan since it will be used to improve his family's income.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Manzura

texts.en:
Manzura is one of the smart members of her family who lives happily but poorly. She is 49 years old and has a lovely husband who went to Russia to find a job. They are bringing up four children. Manzura tries to provide them with a high quality living condition. With this aim, eight years ago she began her own business with selling of ‘kuraga’. She has a garden full of apricot trees. There are more than 70 trees bearing apricots. She collects the apricots, dries them and sells as ‘kuraga’ to local people. 

The developing side of her business is connected to her harvest. This season she had a small harvest, which is why she wants to buy additional ‘kuraga’ to make full her business assets and continue selling her goods. Her income is small and she can’t do it without additional capital. She is asking for a loan of 500 USD to buy ‘kuraga’ to develop her business. Each month she will make her payment on time. She will be happy for your support.

loans.use: To buy ‘kuraga’ for developing business

loans.name: Muharam

texts.en:
Muharam is 41 years old, married, and has 2 children. She owns a clothes store, which is based in the local market. Here she sells women's clothes and has a lot of customers as she renews her assortment every season. 

To improve business, she is borrowing the amount from Imon International organization to buy women's clothes for the new winter season. She’s hopeful of the possibility of expanding her business before long.

loans.use: To buy women's clothes for the winter season

loans.name: Jamol

texts.en: Jamol is a hardworking man. He is married and has two children. In order to provide his family with all necessary things, eight years ago he began his own business dealing with farming. He grows onions, wheat and grapes. Also he is a builder and gets enough income. He wants to comfort his family with good living conditions. With this aim he is beginning to repair his house but he doesn't have money to buy paint and other building materials. He is asking for a loan of 400 USD to buy building materials to repair his house. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair his house

loans.name: Bineta

texts.fr: Bineta est une femme célibataire qui évolue depuis 10 ans dans le secteur du commerce. Elle gère une boutique et vend des produits alimentaires  et divers. Elle commence sa journée de travail à 7h et la termine a 00h. Grâce aux revenus que lui procure son activité elle parvient a satisfaire certains besoins personnels et prend en charge la location de la boutique ou elle exerce son activité. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC ou elle a déjà remboursé 06 prêts antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de produits qu’elle commercialise dans sa boutique. D’autre part elle souhaite acheter de fournitures scolaires qu’elle va revendre car elle a l’intention de diversifier les produits qu’elle offre a sa clientèle dans l’objectif de mieux développer son activité de commerce et accroitre ses revenus. Elle souhaite dans le futur voyager pour importer des marchandises pour les besoins de son commerce.
texts.en:
Bineta is a single woman who has been doing business for 10 years.  She runs a boutique that sells food products, among other things.  She begins her workday at 7:00am and closes at 12:00am.  Thanks to the profits she earns from her business, she is able to satisfy her own needs and pay the rent for the shop where she does business.

She is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches, where she has already repaid six previous loans.  She is asking for a credit of 400,000frs in order to purchase products for resale in her boutique.  Additionally, she hopes to buy school supplies that she will resell since she intends to start diversifying the products that she offers to her clientele; the objective is to best develop her business and to bolster her income.  In the future, she hopes to travel for the purpose of importing merchandise for her business.

loans.use: to purchase food items and school supplies for resale.

loans.name: Allia

texts.en: Allia is a 49-year-old married woman who has three family members and comes from Sahab, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to pay for her home improvements. She wants to repaint her home and to do maintenance on the home. She hopes in the future to buy new furniture.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Ndieme's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois abritant ce grouoe est créé depuis le  19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 11 membres qui habitent la même localité et vivant dans une belle harmonie. Leurs principales activités sont le commerce, la restauration et l'embouche.
Marème est mariée et mère de 02 garçons. Âgée de 26 ans, elle est debout à droite de la photo la main levée. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Elle achète 15 cartons de savon et un sac de savon en poudre qu'elle revend au détail. Elle fait aussi une activité parallèle à savoir la restauration. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 2010. Après avoir réapprovisionner son stock de commerce, elle utilise l'argent qui reste pour renforcer son activité parallèle.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de pourvoir au bien-être de sa famille (scolarisation, santé, nourriture) et d'augmenter ses épargnes.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois overseeing this group was created on November 19, 2004.  It is made up of 11 members who reside in the same locality and live in good harmony with each other.  They are primarily involved in retail business, in the preparation of meals, and in the fattening of livestock.

Marème is married and the mother of two boys.  She is 26 years old and standing on the right-hand side in the photo, raising her hand.  Her main activity is retail business.  She buys 15 boxes of soap and one bag of soap powder and then resells her goods for retail.  Additionally, she also prepares meals.  She has been involved in this type of activity since 2010.

After replenishing her stock of goods, she uses the rest of her money to strengthen her second business.  Her profits allow her to ensure her family's well-being (children's education, healthcare, food needs) and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy soap.

loans.name: Nael's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois est créé depuis le 19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 21 membres qui habitent dans la même localité. Ces membres sont solidaires entre eux et vivent dans la bonne entente. Elles ont comme activité principale le commerce, l'embouche et la restauration.
Nael, âgée de 49 ans, est debout à droite de la photo la main levée. Elle est mariée et mère de 09 enfants dont 04 garçons et 05 filles. Sa principale activité est l'embouche bovine. Avec le prêt, elle achète un bœuf qu'elle élève au bout de 06 mois, elle le revend dans les marchés hebdomadaires. Elle fait aussi de la restauration comme activité parallèle. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 10 ans. Après avoir acheté le bœuf, avec le restant de l'argent, elle achète des ustensiles pour renflouer sa gargote.
Les bénéfices lui permettent d'entretenir sa famille et participe à la scolarisation des enfants. Elle s'en sert aussi pour augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was created on November 19, 2004.  It is made up of 21 members who live in the same locality.  They support each other in a spirit of solidarity and they live in good harmony.  Their main activity is retail business, the fattening of livestock and the preparation of meals.

Nael, age 49, is standing on the right-hand side in the photo and raising her hand.  She is married and the mother of nine children (four boys and five girls).  Her main activity is the fattening of cattle.  She is using her loan to buy an ox which she will raise for six months and then resell at a weekly market.  Additionally, Nael prepares meals.  She has been involved in this activity for ten years.  After buying the ox, she will use the rest of her money to buy utensils for her food booth.

Her profits allow her to provide for her family, to contribute to her children's education, and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to fatten up cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy women's and children's clothes to resell.

loans.name: Dua'a

texts.en:
Dua'a is a 22-year-old married woman from Nao'or, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to buy materials for making  bread to sell in the same neighborhood. She wants to increase her products. She hopes in the future to expand her project. 
Since Dua'a is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy materials for making  bread  to sell

loans.name: Maïmouna's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois abritant ce groupe est créé le 28 décembre 2009. Il est composé de 48 membres qui habitent la même localité. Ces membres entretiennent de bonnes relations et sont solidaires entre eux.
Aminata, âgée de 34 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 05 enfants dont 02 garçons et 03 filles.
Avec le prêt, elle compte renforcer son échoppe. Elle achète 10 sacs de lait en poudre, 02 sacs de sucre en poudre qu'elle va revendre au détail. Elle achète aussi une barrique de mil à 20000 F pour confectionner du thiacri, qu'elle va revendre.
Avec les bénéfices générés, elle contribue à l'entretien des enfants et améliore le quotidien de la famille. Les bénéfices lui permettent aussi de payer ses intérêts et de renflouer son épargne.
Les trois femmes en médaillons étaient absentes lors de la prise de la photo.
texts.en:
The 'banc villageois' that houses this group was created on December 28, 2009. It comprises 48 members who live in the same town. These members maintain good relationships and mutually support one another. 

Aminata, 34 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of five children (2 boys and 3 girls). With this loan, she intends to bolster her shop. She is purchasing 10 bags of powdered milk and 2 bags of powdered sugar that she is going to sell retail. She is also purchasing a barrel of millet for 20,000 francs to make 'thiacri' which she is going to sell.

With the profits, she helps to care for the children and improve day-to-day family life. The profits will also enable her to pay the loan interest and to grow her savings.

loans.use: to bolster her shop

loans.name: Gueye's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 28 décembre 2009. Il est composé de membres qui habitent la même localité. La solidarité et l'entraide prévalent dans le quartier.
Rockhaya, âgée de 55 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée à mère de 05 enfants, deux garçons et 03 filles. Elle fait de la tannerie.
Avec le prêt, elle compte acheter des peaux de moutons, de chèvres ou de bœufs (1500 peaux par mois à 500 F l'unité) qu'elle tanne pour ensuite les vendre au cordonniers.
Avec les bénéfices, elle améliore le quotidien de sa famille; paie la scolarité des enfants et leur habillement, mais aussi ces bénéfices vont lui permettre de payer ses intérêts et d'augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
This group was created the December 28, 2009. It is composed of members who all live in the same area. Solidarity and mutual support prevail in their neighborhood. 

Rockhaya, standing on the right side of the photo with her hand raised, is 55 years old and married. She is the mother of 5 children, 2 boys and 3 girls. 

Rockhaya is a tanner. With this loan, she hopes to buy sheep, goat, or cow skins (1,500 skins per month a 500 francs each) that she will tan and then sell to shoemakers. 

With the profits, she will improve the life of her family and pay for her children's schooling and their clothing. The profits will also allow her to pay the interest [on the loan] and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy animal skins to tan and sell

loans.name: Binta's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 21 décembre 2009. Il est composé de 33 femmes membres qui entretiennent de très bonnes relations.
Coudy, âgée de 51 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 05 enfants; 03 garçons et 02 filles. Sa principale activité est le commerce de beignet. Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d'acheter de la farine, de l'huile et des ingrédient pour prépares des beignets qu'elle revend dans son village.
Les bénéfices vont lui permettre d'améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille et à la scolarisation des enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 21, 2009. It is composed of 33 women, who enjoy very good relations with one another.

Coudy, aged 51, is standing to the right and raising her hand in the picture. She is married and a mother of five children, three boys and two girls. Her main business is the retail of fritters. Her new loan will allow her to buy flower, oil and other ingredients to prepare fritters, which she resells in her village. 

Profits will allow her to improve her family’s living conditions and to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy flower, oil and other ingredients to prepare fritters to sell

loans.name: Mariama's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 21 décembre 2009. Les 48 membres qui le compose habitent le même quartier et s'entendent très bien.
Dieynaba, âgée de 39 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Elle vend du Pain, du niébé, du mil et de l'arachide. Elle fait aussi une activité parallèle à savoir de l'embouche ovine. Elle achète 02 moutons pour les élever et ensuite les revendre.
Avec les bénéfices récoltés, elle envisage d'inscrire ses enfants au collège et subvenir à leur bien être social.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 21, 2009. The 48 members composing it live in the same district and get along very well together. 

Dieynaba, 39 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of seven children. Her main work involves commerce. She sells bread, black-eyed peas, millet, and peanuts. She also has a parallel business, namely the fattening of sheep. She is purchasing two head of sheep to raise and then resell. 

With the profits earned, she envisions sending her children to middle school and supporting their well-being.

loans.use: to operate small businesses

loans.name: Nassara's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé le 21 décembre 2009. La majeur partie de ses membres habitent le même quartier et entretiennent de très bonnes relations.
Dambo, âgée de 51 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Sa principale activité est l'embouche (bovine, ovine et caprine). Elle pratique cette activité depuis des années. 
Avec son crédit, elle compte acheter un bœuf qu'elle va élever pour ensuite le revendre d'ici quelques mois.
Les bénéfices récoltés vont lui permettre d'aider son mari dans les charges domestiques; de même, elle prévoit d'acheter un moulin.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 21. 2009. The majority of its members live in the same district  and maintain good relations.

Dambo, 51 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of seven children. Her main work involves fattening animals (cattle, sheep, and goats). She has been in this business for years. With her loan, she intends to purchase a steer that she will raise and then resell a few months from now. 

The profits earned will enable her to help out her husband to cover domestic expenses; and also, she plans on purchasing a mill or grinder.

loans.use: to raise animals to sell

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe créé depuis le 17 mai 1997 est composé des membres du village et des villages environnants. Les membres vivent dans la bonne entente et la convivialité et sont très solidaire entre elles. Leurs principales activités sont l'embouche et le commerce.
Amy, âgée de 38 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est mariée et mère de 06 enfants dont 04 garçons et 02 filles et un autre enfant en charge. Sa principale activité est l'embouche bovine. Elle fait cette activité depuis 03 cycles. 
Avec le prêt, elle achète 01 veau qu'elle élève, arrivé à maturité, elle le revend dans les marchés hebdomadaires. Elle achète aussi un mouton qu'elle élève pour ensuite le revendre. Avec ce qui reste de l'argent, elle fait une activité parallèle à savoir le petit commerce.
Après avoir payer son prêt, les bénéfices lui permettent de s'occuper du bien être de ses enfants, de la reconstruction de sa maison et participe dans la dépense quotidienne de la famille.
texts.en:
This group, in existence since May 17, 1997, is composed of individuals living in the same village or nearby. They have a good rapport, maintaining friendly relations and supporting each others. Their main line of work is raising livestock and vending.

Amy, 38 years old (the one standing on the right raising her hand in the photo), is married and mother of six: four sons and two daughters. She also has one other child in her care. Her main line of work is raising sheep. She has completed three cycles already.

With this loan, she [will] buy one calf to raise and, once it reaches maturity, to sell at the weekly market. She will also buy a sheep to fatten and resale. She will use the remainder of the funds for her  work as a vendor, an additional business activity. After paying off her loan, she will have a profit allowing her to take care of her children, repair her house and contribute to everyday family expenses.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Faty's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe a été créé le 28 décembre 2009. Les 27 membres habitent pour la plupart le même quartier. Elle s'entendent bien et la majeur partie fait le petit commerce.
Faty, âgée de 22 ans,debout à droite de la photo et la main levée, est mariée sans enfant. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Avec son prêt, elle compte faire du petit commerce. Elle achète des accessoires d'habillement pour homme, femme et enfant qu'elle revend. Elle s'approvisionne dans les grandes villes ou elle peut trouver une dizaine de robes pour enfants à 2500 F l'article; 08 paires de chaussures à 3000 F la paire.
Avec les bénéfices, elle compte renforcer son capital pour préparer son prochain prêt.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 28, 2009. The 27 members live for the most part in the same district, and they get along well. Most of them have small businesses.

Faty, 22 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is married and without children. Her main work involves commerce. With this loan, she intends to work in small-scale commerce.  She is buying some clothing accessories for men, women, and children that she resells. She gets her supplies  from the big cities where she can find a dozen dresses for children at 2,500 francs each and 8 pairs of shoes at 3,000 francs a pair.

With the profits, she plans to increase her capital, so as to prepare for her next loan.

loans.use: to purchase clothing accessories for men, women, and children to sell

loans.name: Awa's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé le 28 décembre 2009. Il est composé de membres du même quartier qui entretiennent de très bonne relations et dont le commerce est leur activité principale.
Khady, âgée de 59 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est mariée et mère d'un enfant de 20 ans. Sa principale activité est le commerce. Avec le prêt, elle compte acheter des chaussures pour enfants et adultes. Elle achète pour 20 paires de chaussures adultes à 1500 F la paire et 15 paires de chaussures enfants à 900 F la paire.
Avec les bénéfices, elle compte augmenter son épargne pour parer à certaines éventualités et aussi pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 28, 2009. It is composed of members from the same district who maintain very good relations. Their main work involves commerce. 

Khady, 59 years old, is standing at the right with her hand raised in the photo. She is a married mother of one child, who is 20 years old. Khady's main work involves commerce. With this loan, she intends to purchase shoes for children and adults. She is purchasing 20 pairs of adult shoes at 1,500 francs a pair and 15 pairs of children's shoes at 900 francs a pair.

With the profits, she plans to increase her savings to fend off certain eventualities and also to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase shoes to sell

loans.name: Gandong Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe vient d'être créé (ce 10 Octobre 2012) avec un effectif de 35 femmes. Elles habitent le même quartier avec une bonne relation de voisinage. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce de produits divers.
Mme Adèle est l'emprunteur en vedette du groupe. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite avec la main levée. Cette dame est âgée de 57 ans, mariée et mère de 02 garçons. Elle a également une fille adoptive en sa charge.
Mme Adèle compte acheter de la mire pour une valeur de 45.000 frs (50 litres à 900 frs l'unité) et payer 5.000 frs pour le transport sur Dakar. Elle les vend à 2.500 frs le litre.
Avec les bénéfices de son activité, elle compte aider son époux à la prise en charge des enfants, pour la scolarité, la santé et la nourriture.
texts.en:
This group was created on the 10th of October, 2012, with a membership of 35 women. They live in the same area and have good neighbourly relationships. Their main business is the retail of various products.

Adèle is the group's featured borrower. She is the one standing on the right of the picture with her hand raised. She is 57 years old, married and the mother of 2 boys. She also has an adopted daughter in her charge.
