Adèle plans to buy a quantity of myrrh worth 45 000 francs (50 litres at 900 francs per litre) and pay 5 000 francs for the transportation to Dakar. She will resell it at 2 500 francs per litre. She plans to use the profits generated by her business to help her husband take care of the children's education, health and food expenses.

loans.use: to buy myrrh for resale in Dakar.

loans.name: Adama's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois est inauguré le 03-12-2007. Le groupe représente 36 membres.Elles habitent la même localité et sont en bonne entente.

La présidente du groupe, Fatimata Ousmane, est une femme mariée de 64 ans. Elle a un de ses enfants et cinq autres en sa charge. Elle fait du petit commerce. Elle vend de l'arachide, haricot,du mil etc... Elle s'approvisionne au marché de Guéoul les lundi et jeudi. Sur la photo, elle est à droite et a levé sa main gauche.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter des marchandises pour accroître ses bénéfices et un mouton pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide son mari pour les charges familiales et épargne pour atteindre une autonomie.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was created on December 3, 2007.  It is made up of 36 members who live in the same locality and get along well with each other.

The group's leader, Fatimata Ousmane, is a 64-year-old married woman.  She takes care of one of her children, as well as five other children.  

Fatimata Ousmane is involved in small retail business.  She sells groundnut, beans, millet etc..  She stocks up at the Guéoul market on Mondays and Thursdays.  In the photo, she is standing on the right-hand side, raising her left hand.

With her loan, she will buy various goods, which will help her to boost her profits.  She will also purchase a sheep for fattening up.

She uses her profits to support her husband in taking care of the family expenses.  Thanks to her profits, she also saves some money and hopes to reach financial autonomy.

loans.use: to buy various goods and livestock for fattening.

loans.name: Sainte Therese Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe est créé le 04 décembre 2007, il est composé de femmes venant de différents quartiers de la ville mais sont unies par affinité, amitié et par confiance. Elles s'activent dans diverses activités telles que le petit commerce, la couture,  l'élevage.Le groupe PC est composé de 17 femmes.
Madame Emilie est âgée de 41 ans, mariée elle est mère de 04 enfants dont 1 garçon et 03 filles, elle s'active dans la vente de friperie, de la beurre de karité ,capitalise une bonne expérience de plusieurs années. Sur la photo elle est debout à droite. Son prêt lui permettra de satisfaire la clientèle et se faire beaucoup de revenus. Avec les bénéfices obtenus Emilie appui son mari dans la scolarisation et la santé de la famille; elle renforce aussi son épargne et gère ses petits besoins.
texts.en:
This group was created on the 4th of December, 2007. It is made up of women who come from different parts of town but who are united by affinity, friendship and trust. Their businesses include retail, sewing services and livestock breeding. The PC group is made up of 17 women.

Emilie is 41 years old, married and the mother of 4 children (one boy and 3 girls). She sells second-hand clothing and shea butter, and benefits from several years of good experience. She is standing on the right of the picture.

Emilie's loan will enable her to satisfy her clientèle and to earn a large income. She uses the profits she makes to help her husband take care of the family's education and health. She also builds up her savings and covers her own small needs.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Agath's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois qui abrite ce groupe a vu le jour le 19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 06 membres habitant la même localité et vivant dans la bonne entente. Leurs principales activités sont le commerce, l'embouche et la restauration.
Oumy, 37 ans, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est mariée et mère de 07 enfants dont 02 garçons et 05 filles. Elle gère son magasin où elle vend de l'alimentation générale. Elle pratique cette activité depuis 1996. Le prêt lui permet de renflouer son magasin en achetant de nouveaux produits. Elle fait comme activité parallèle de l'embouche porcine. Avec ce qui reste de l'argent, elle achète de porcins qu'elle élève et au bout de 05 mois, les revends sur le marché.
Les bénéfices  générés vont servir à la scolarisation de ses enfants et aussi au bien-être de la famille.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois (Village Lending Group) that houses this group was started on November 19, 2004. It is made up of six members living in the same area who get along. Their principal activities are sales, livestock fattening, and food service.
Oumy, 37 years old, standing up at the right of the photo and raising her hand, is married and mother of 7 children (2 boys and 5 girls). She runs her store where she sells general grocery products. She has been in this business since 1996. The loan will allow her to replenish her store by buying new products. Concurrent with running this business, she practices pork fattening. With the remainder of the money, she will buy pigs which she will raise up to five months and resell them at the market.
The profits generated will be used for her children's education and the family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs to replenish her store.

loans.name: Anta's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est créé depuis le 03 décembre 2007 Il est composé par des femmes qui habitent le même village et aux alentours.Elles font comme activité principale le commerce d'habits .Anta âgée de 37 ans est mariée et mère de 6 enfants dont 04 garçons et 02 filles. Elle est debout sur la photo et levant la main gauche.Avec le prêt reçu elle compte acheter des habits qu'elle revend auprès de ses clients dans les villages environnants, elle s'active dans le commerce de niébé d'arachide, des haricots elle mène cette activité depuis 06 ans. Les bénéfices lui permettent de prendre en charge la famille puisque son mari est en Italie.
texts.en: This group was created on December 3, 2007. It is made up of women who live in the same village and its environs. As a business, they mainly sell clothing. Anta, 37 years old, is married and mother of six children (four boys and two girls). She is standing up in the photo and raising her left hand. WIth the loan, she counts on buying clothing that she will resell to customers in the nearby villages. She works selling cowpeas and beans and has been in this business for six years. The profits will allow her to take care of her family since her husband is in Italy.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Nafi's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois qui abrite ce groupe est inauguré le 28 septembre 2012. Il est composé de 27 femmes qui sont issues de la même localité et ont comme principales activités le commerce,l'agriculture et l'élevage; le groupe PC 1 est constitué de vingt sept femmes.


L'emprunteur vedette Madame Nafi est une femme mariée âgée de 44 ans, elle est mère de 8 enfants dont le plus jeune a 8 ans, elle a aussi une petite fille de 3ans. Elle est matrone dans la case de santé du village,elle capitalise une bonne expérience de plusieurs années;elle fait parallèlement de l'embouche ovine.Debout à droite de la photo, elle est vêtue en blanc fleurettes jaunes et a levé la main gauche.


Avec son prêt Nafi  compte acheter 2 moutons pour embouche ovine et espère les revendre 4 à 5 mois après pour préparer son remboursement.  

Elle participe aux dépenses familiales (scolarité, habillement, nourriture, santé) pour soutenir son mari.
texts.en:
The Banc Villageois (Village Lending Group) that houses this group was founded on September 28, 2012. It is made up of 27 women from the same area who work mainly in sales, agriculture and livestock fattening; the group PC 1 is made up of 27 women.
The featured borrower Madame Nafi is a 44 year old married woman. She is the mother of eight children, the youngest of whom is eight. She also has a granddaughter who is three years old. She is the house mother at the outpost health clinic in the village and she has several years of experience. She  practices sheep fattening concurrently. Standing up at the right of the photo, she is dressed in white and yellow flowers and is raising her left hand. 
With her loan, Nafi counts on buying two sheep for fattening and hopes to resell them four or five months later to prepare for her repayment.
She participates in the family spending (school fees, clothing, food, health) to support her husband.

loans.use: to buy two sheep for fattening

loans.name: Falla's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de Sop Serigne Bara est créé le jour de l'inauguration 21 septembre 2012. Il est composé de cinquante femmes issues du même quartier et leurs activités dominantes sont le petit commerce, la restauration, l'élevage,la couture,crochet, broderie.
Madame Khoudia la responsable est âgée de 30 ans, elle est mariée mère de 04 enfants dont 02 garçons et 02 filles , elle s'active dans le petit commerce de niébé, elle fait parallèlement le travail de relais de santé au poste de santé de la localité; elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine qu'elle pratique depuis belle lurette. Elle est debout sur la photo à droite et a levé sa main gauche. Son prêt lui servira d'acheter du niébé et c'est une activité qui lui rapporte beaucoup de revenus. Ses bénéfices obtenus lui permettent de se prendre en charge et d'épargner au niveau du BV.
texts.en:
The Sop Serigne Bara group was inaugurated on the 21st of September, 2012. It is made up of 50 women who come from the same area and whose main businesses include retail, restaurants, livestock breeding, sewing, crochet and embroidery services.

Khoudia, the group leader, is 30 years old. She is married and the mother of 4 children (2 boys and 2 girls). She sells black-eyed peas and also works as a health advisor in the local health centre. She has a good experience in her line of work, which she has been doing for a long time. She is standing on the right of the picture with her left hand raised. Her loan will be used to buy black-eyed peas, a business which generates a lot of revenue for her. The profits she makes allow her to be self-sufficient and to build some savings with the banc villageois.

loans.use: to buy black-eyed peas.

loans.name: Aissatou's Group

texts.fr: Le groupe est créé le jour de l'inauguration le 28 septembre 2012, il regroupe trente cinq femmes qui sont unies par des liens d'amitié et habitent le même village, elles mènent diverses activités le petit commerce, l'artisanat et l'élevage. Mariama la responsable est âgée de 39 ans, mariée elle est mère de 3 enfants de sexe masculin, elle mène une activité d'embouche ovine avec une expérience moyenne.Elle est debout tout à fait à droite sur la photo . Son prêt lui servira à acheter 02 moutons afin de gagner beaucoup de revenus. Elle souhaite avec ses bénéfices épargner dans le BV.
texts.en:
This group was inaugurated on the 28th of September, 2012. It brings together 35 women who are united by bonds of friendship and live in the same village. They have various businesses; retail, crafts and livestock breeding.

Mariama, the group leader, is 39 years old. She is married and the mother of 3 male children. She has a sheep-fattening business and has moderate experience in the field. She is standing on the far right of the picture. Her loan will be used to buy 2 sheep so that she can earn a large income. She wishes to use her profits to build her savings with the banc villageois.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Ramatoulaye's Group

texts.fr:
Le Banc Villageois dont fait partie ce groupe a a été mis en place le 19 novembre 2004. Il est composé de 06 membres qui habitent dans la même localité. Elles entretiennent de bonnes relations et sont solidaires entre elles. Leurs principales activités sont le commerce, l'embouche et la restauration.
Sokhna, debout à droite de la photo et levant la main est âgée de 73 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants dont 01 garçon et 06 filles. Sa principale activité est le commerce, activité qu'elle pratique cela fait environ 20 ans. 
Avec le prêt, elle compte  acheter des sacs de choux, de carottes et d'aubergine pour renforcer son commerce de légumes et avec ce qui reste de l'argent, elle va acheter 02 sacs de friperie qu'elle va écouler dans les marchés hebdomadaires.
Les bénéfices lui permettent de renflouer son épargne et de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
The banc villageois, to which this group belongs, was created on the 19th of September, 2004. The group is made up of 6 members who live in the same village. They enjoy good relationships with each other and are supportive of one another. Their main businesses are retail, livestock-fattening and the restaurant business.

Sokhna, standing on the right of the photo and raising her hand, is 73 years old. She is married and the mother of 7 children, 1 boy and 6 girls. Her main business is retail, a line of work she has been in for around 20 years. She plans to use this loan to buy bags of cabbages, carrots and aubergines, so that she can strengthen her vegetable-selling business. She will use the remainder of the money to buy 2 bags of second-hand clothing which she will sell at the weekly markets. The profits she makes enable her to increase her savings and meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Ena Mercedes

texts.es: Ena  tiene 45 años de edad está divorciada de su conyugue, Tiene 1 hijo de 8 años de edad que estudia en una escuela pública del sector por donde viven. Ella es una mujer luchadora y da gracias a Dios que aunque  su hijo no tiene un padre ella lo  ha criado con mucho cariño. Ena a pesar de ser madre soltera nunca le ha faltado nada a su hijo. Por eso ella tiene un negocio que es la venta comida. Ena  trabaja  todos los días de 6:00am hasta 15:00pm Su meta es tener su local propio arreglar su casa. Con el préstamo ella quiere Comprar carnes, víveres, condimentos etc.Su sueño es poderle dar una vida mejor su hijo
texts.en: Ena, 45, is divorced from her spouse.  She has an eight year old son who attends an elementary school in the sector they live in.  She comments that she’s been a hardworking woman and thanks to God she’s raised her son with much love even though he has no father.  She comments that her son has never lacked anything.  For this reason she has a food business.  Ena works every day from 6am until 3pm.  Her goal is to have a locale of her own and to improve her house.  She will use the loan to buy meat, foodstuffs, condiments, etc. Her dream is to give a better life to her child.

loans.use: to buy meat, foodstuffs, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Alma Rosa

texts.es: La solicitante señora Alma Rosa tiene poco que se quedo viuda, cuenta con un hijo que adoptaron ella y su esposo el cual se quedo bajo su responsabilidad. Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder colocar  el techo a un cuarto ya que va ser de cemento para que sea más duradero y seguro, por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora. La señora Alma Rosa tiene un negocio de venta de productos de belleza por cataloga con sus vecinas y familiares, en coacciones sale a vender en diferentes partes de la ciudad. Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio será para pagar el crédito, ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para darle lo mejor a su hijo. Desea mejorar la calidad de vida y que su hijo tenga su propio espacio en la casa. Espera contar nuevamente con su cooperación ya que ha tenido tres créditos con Kiva los cuales ha tenido un buen historial de pagos.
texts.en:
Ms. Alma Rosa recently became a widow.  She has one adopted son, who she is still responsible for.  She is requesting this loan to buy a roof for a room to make it more durable and safe.  She currently does not have enough money to finish this job.  

Ms. Alma Rosa operates a business selling beauty products from a catalog with her neighbors and family members, and occasionally she goes to other parts of the city.  Part of the profits she obtains from her business will be used to pay this loan, and she uses the rest of the profit to give the best to her son.  She hopes to improve the quality of life for her son so that he can have his own space in the house.  She hopes to receive another loan with lender support, since she has had three Kiva loans, and has always had a good repayment history.

loans.use: Colocación de un techo de concreto

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es:
Freddy es un hombre de 24 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, él es una persona muy alegre, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, Freddy no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las orillas de un rio cercano a su vivienda y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Gracias al apoyo de sus padres, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Freddy trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con una mototaxi de la cual es chofer, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque conoce las zonas donde encontrar mayor cantidad de clientes.
Freddy se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea poder hacer el tarrajeo, pintado y puesta de piso a su hogar; de esta manera Freddy tendrá su vivienda en mejores condiciones, más adecuadas y seguras, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para que junto con su familia pueda salir adelante.
texts.en:
Freddy is a 24-year-old man, is single, and lives in the city of Camaná. He is a very happy, hardworking and enthusiastic person, who has a great desire for improvement. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to work to support his parents, Freddy was not able to study a professional career, but he would really have liked to be able to do so. In his spare time he likes to walk by the banks of a river near his house, and on some occasions cooks a delicious Lomo Saltado [a traditional stir-friend beef dish] to share with his family.

Thanks to the support of his parents, with much determination and dedication, Freddy works offering transportation services. He has a motorcycle taxi which he drives. Everyday from the early hours of the morning he goes out to travel around the streets of his city looking for passengers. He can work approximately 12 hours daily, and believes that his business is doing well because he knows the areas in which to find a larger number of customers.

Freddy is very grateful for the Kiva loans, as thanks to the help offered he will be able to improve his house. He wants to be able to do the cementing, painting and placing of the flooring in his home, and in this way his home will be in better, more adequate and safer conditions. In this way he will continue working and making an effort so that he can get ahead together with his family.

loans.use: to improve his house.

loans.name: Janet Yolanda

texts.es:
Janet es una mujer de 25 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, Janet no pudo estudiar la carrera de Enfermería que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de su madre, Janet puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede atender a un aproximado de 25 clientes y cree que le va bien por su buen atención.
 Janet se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería para su negocio, tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche, menestras, fideos, gaseosas, entre otros; de esta manera Janet tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, con ello espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda ampliar su negocio y así ella espera poder lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y un local propio para el desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Janet is a 25-year-old woman, single, and lives in the city of Pisco with her parents and siblings. She is a very happy, hardworking and enthusiastic person who has a great desire to succeed. Sadly, because of a lack of economic resources and her need to work to support her parents, Janet was not able to study for the nursing degree she wanted, but she would have liked to have been able to do it very much. In her free time, she likes to play sports, and on some occasions, she cooks a very tasty rice with duck to share with her family. 

With much effort, dedication and help from her mother, Janet began her small business selling groceries and drinks. Every day, she starts work early in the morning. She can serve approximately 25 customers, and she believes that things are going well due to her good service. Janet is very grateful for Kiva lenders, because the help given will allow her to buy merchandise for her business, such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, mixed vegetables, noodles, soft drinks, among other things. In this way, she will have a better-stocked business with which she hopes to be able to raise her sales and increase her income. This will help her a lot to be able to grow her business, and she hopes to be able to achieve her great dream of having her own house and her own premises for developing her business.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, oil, milk, mixed vegetables, noodles, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Tahani

texts.en:
Tahani is a 26 year old married female from Sahab in Jordan. She has 2 children and has requested a 1,200 JOD loan to buy woman and children clothes to resell for her friends and neighbors in the same of area. In the future, Tahani is planning to obtain a large room for storing the clothes she sells and improve the living conditions of her family.

Since Tahani is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room out of wood.

loans.name: Dania Regina

texts.es: La joven Dania de 26 años de edad, estudio técnico en computación, es soltera, trabajo con su padre en el negocio pero el fallece y ella se queda a cargo del negocio de Cyber café desde hace 3 años, al comienzo fue muy difícil para ella al adquirir esta responsabilidad y sacarlo adelante fue un proceso duro pero hoy en día le gusta y lo tiene todo controlado, ahora ella apoya a su mama y desea que en un futuro poder hacer más grande el local parar cuando se case y nazcan sus hijos darles todas las condiciones necesarias para su bienestar. Este primer crédito lo necesita para hacer mejoras en la infraestructura del negocio desea realizar de concreto una pared de madera que con el tiempo se ha ido deteriorando, comprara bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, estribo, alambre de amarre y el pago de la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Dania is a single young woman of 26 years of age.  She studied computer technology and worked with her father in the business, but he died and she has been in charge of the cyber cafe business for 3 years.  To begin with, it was very difficult for her to assume this responsibility, and taking the business forward was a painstaking process.  Now, however, she enjoys it and has everything under control.  She now supports her mother and hopes that, in the future, she will be able to extend the premises so that, when she marries and has children, she can provide the necessary conditions for their well-being.  

Dania needs this initial loan to make improvements to the business premises.  She wants to concrete over a wooden wall which has deteriorated over time and will buy breeze-blocks, cement, sand, iron, wall supports and fastening wire.  She will also use the loan to pay her workforce.

loans.use: To buy breeze-blocks, cement, sand, iron, wall supports and fastening wire, and to pay her workforce.

loans.name: Celia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Celia de 39 años de edad, de familia agricultora, dedicada por completo a esta labor, su esposo ahora trabaja como albañil y con ese ingreso se apoyan para los gastos del hogar, sus hijos gracias a dios continúan estudiando a pesar de los obstáculos que tuvieron de la falta de financiamiento para la agricultura pero que poco a poco fue adquiriendo préstamo y pagando a tiempo sus cuotas, ahora ella solicita su octavo crédito para darle mantenimiento a una manzana de piña comprando abono, urea e insecticidas para ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes, para un futuro aumentar a dos manzanas sus siembras de piñas y así obtener más ganancias para ayudar a la familia.
texts.en:
Celia is 39 years old, from a farming family, and completely dedicated to this work. Her husband now works as a construction worker and with this income they support each other with the household expenses. Thanks to God her children are continuing their studies, despite the obstacles that they faced due to the lack of funding for farming. However, little by little they acquired loans and repaid their installments on time. 

Today Celia is requesting her eighth loan to maintain a plot of land sown with pineapples by buying fertilizer, urea and insecticides. This will allow her to offer better products to her customers, and in the future to augment her sowing of pineapples to two plots of land, thus make more profits to support her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, urea and insecticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy insecticide, fertiliser and urea.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy another dairy cow and increase his production of milk.

loans.name: Carlos Hugo

texts.es:
Carlos es un hombre de 43 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pareja y su pequeño hijo de 8 años, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Carlos no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Civil que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos, y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Carlos trabaja brindando servicios de transporte, el cuenta con una pequeña mototaxi, la cual utiliza para brindar sus servicios, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su ciudad en búsqueda de pasajeros, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por el empeño que le pone a su trabajo.
Carlos se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como prendas de vestir, tanto para damas, caballeros y niños; de esta manera Carlos junto con el apoyo de su pareja  podrá iniciar su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, así pues él desea seguir trabajando y esforzándose para brindarles una buena educación y calidad de vida para su pequeño.
texts.en:
Carlos is 43 years old and lives in the city of Chincha with his partner and 8-year-old son. He loves his family dearly, and they are his principal motivation in life. He is a kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person who, together with his partner, does his best to provide a good life for his family. Unfortunately, Carlos was not able to study to be a civil engineer as he would have liked. In his free time, he likes to play soccer with his friends and neighbors and sometimes cooks delicious chicken and rice for his family.  

Carlos has a small mototaxi and works hard seven days a week offering transport services. He sets off early every morning to go around the city streets looking for customers, and works around 12 hours a day. He believes that his hard work has been the key to his success. Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, with their help, he will be able to buy merchandise (men's, women's, and children's clothes) in order to start a small clothes-selling business with his partner. Carlos wants to continue working hard to be able to provide a good education and quality of life for his son.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men, women and children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy perfume, compacts, make up, trousers and ladies' and men's shirts

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Aracely es una clienta que es madre de dos hijos que estudian, por la educación y el bienestar de ellos ella trabaja sin descanso esforzándose al máximo porque quiere que sus hijos sean grandes profesionales, ahora no tiene el apoyo del padre de ellos pero para ella no ha sido un obstáculo para progresar, se desempeña siempre para una zona franca como operaria de maquina con más de 8 horas laborables al día para llevar el pan a la casa. Está optando por su tercer crédito para realizar mejora de infraestructura por lo que necesita comprar láminas de zinc y perlines para reparar el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado para  que su familia viva en mejores condiciones, es por eso que ella acude a solicitar apoyo de préstamo la cual está muy agradecida por la ayuda obtenida.
texts.en:
Aracely is a client who is a mother of two children who study. She works tirelessly for their education and well-being, doing her best, because she wants her children to be great professionals. She does not have the support of their father now, but this has not been an obstacle to progress for her. She always works for a free trade zone as an assembly plant worker, and works for more than eight hours a day to provide for her home. 

Aracely is applying for her third loan in order to carry out infrastructure improvements. She she needs to buy zinc sheets and purlins to repair the roof of her home that is in poor conditions, so that her family can live in better conditions. That is why she has come to request loan support and is grateful for the help obtained.

loans.use: To buy zinc sheets and purlins.

loans.name: Jazmina Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Jazmina habitante del barrio monseñor Lezcano, siempre se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos aproximadamente desde hace 7 años producto que distribuye por encargo y mantiene en su casa, sus hijos creciendo cada vez mas y preparándose para ser profesionales en un futuro, el cual es el mayor sueño de Jazmina, todo gracias a la ayuda de su mama que siendo soltera los ha sacado adelante. Solicita apoyo de un cuarto crédito para invertir en 2 bolsones de ropa de segunda para seguir trabajando y ofrecerle variedad a su clientela.
texts.en: Jazmina lives in the neighbourhood of Monseñor Lezcano. For about seven years she has sold clothing and cosmetics on a continuous basis, articles that she delivers to order and which she stores at home. Her children are growing all the time and are studying to be professionals in the future. This is Jazmina's greatest dream. Thanks to her mother's help she has been able to give her children a good education, as she herself is a single mother. She is applying for a fourth loan to invest in two bags of second-hand clothing, in order to be able to continue working and to offer her customers variety.

loans.use: To buy two bags of used clothing.

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Due to cultural reasons, Reem prefers that her photo is not on the Internet. Thus, the above photo is of her husband.

Reem is a 32-year-old married female from Sahab, Jordan. She has six children.

She has requested a loan of 1000 Jordanian dinar to pay for her home improvement expenses and for building additional rooms.

In the future, Reem is planning to build another floor and a store room opposite the house.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvement expenses

loans.name: Bok Askane Ourack 1 Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de 38 femmes toutes du même village. Elles vivent toutes en bonne entente et harmonie.

L'emprunteur en vedette de ce groupe, Wedji, est une femme mariée. Elle est âgée de 50 ans. Elle est mère de 06 enfants dont 03 garçons. Elle fait du petit commerce. Elle vend des produits détergents, des boucles d'oreilles etc....Elle mène cette activité depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle se ravitaille à Dakar, Touba ou Louga. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite avec la main levée.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter 02 seaux de détergents et 02 moutons pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide ses enfants pour leur scolarité.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 38 women all from the same village. They all get along well together living in harmony.

The featured borrower of this group is Wedji. She is a married woman, 50 years old, and the mother of six children, including three boys. She has a small-scale business selling detergents, earrings, etc. and has been in this business for over ten years. She resupplies herself from Dakar, Touba, or Louga. In the photo, she is standing at the right with her hand raised.

With her loan, she would like to purchase 2 buckets of detergents and 2 head of sheep to fatten. 

With her profits, she helps her children by covering their schooling costs.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for commerce and some animals to fatten

loans.name: Bata Yacine's Group

texts.fr: le groupe  a été créé le 30 décembre 2009.IL est composé de 06 femmes issues du même village. Elles se son&ét organisées par affinité, par voisinage. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce et l'embouche ovine. Magatte Mamadou(debout à droite sur la photo) est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 38 ans. Elle a en charge 04 enfants. Elle a comme activité principale le petit commerce d'habits. En parallèle elle fait de l'embouche Ovine. Elle mène cette d'activité depuis longtemps. Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter la marchandise 10 pièces de tissus 10 paquets de garniture pour les pagnes et des moutons pour la poursuite de ses activités et la satisfaction de sa clientèle. Son objectif est de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et de renforcer son épargne à chaque réunion.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 30, 2009. It comprises six women from the same village. They are organized by affinity and neighborhood. Their main work involves small-scale commerce and the fattening of sheep. 

Magatte Mamadou (standing at the right in the photo) is the group's official. She is 38 years old and has four children to support. She has a business selling clothing. Parallel to this, she fattens sheep. She has been doing this work for a long time. 

Her loan will enable her to purchase merchandise: 10 lengths of cloth, 10 packets of accessories for 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa), and some sheep for business purposes and for satisfying her customers. Her goal is to support her family and to bolster her savings at every group meeting.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, thread, and sheep

loans.name: Khoudia's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de 06 femmes toutes du même village. Elles vivent en parfaite harmonie.

L'emprunteur en vedette de ce groupe,Couma Salla, est une femme âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants dont 01 garçon. Elle fait du petit commerce et de l'embouche. Sur La photo, elle est debout avec la main levée.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter 01kg de poivre,un paquet de jumbo, 01 kg piment et 04 moutons pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille et épargne au sein du banc villageois.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 6 women all from the same village. They live in perfect harmony. 

The featured borrower in this group is Couma Salla. She is a 36-year-old woman, married, and the mother of two children, including one boy. She has a small-scale businesses and fattens animals to sell. In the photo, she is the one standing with her hand raised.

With her loan, she would like to purchase 1 kg of black pepper, a packet of Jumbo, 1 kg of chili peppers, and 4 head of sheep to fatten.

With the profits, she helps out her husband in covering family expenses and saves money at the 'banc villageois'.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and animals to raise and sell

loans.name: Mame Diarra's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est constitué de 20 femmes toutes du même village. Elles habitent la même localité et développent de bonnes relations amicales.

La représentante de ce groupe, Mame Diarra, est une femme mariée de 39 ans avec 06 enfants dont 04 garçons. Elle fait du petit commerce de tissus. Elle fait aussi de l’élevage et de l'agriculture. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite en orange
.

Avec son prêt, elle voudrait acheter 10 rouleaux de Tissus maylous et 01 de bassin et 05 moutons pour embouche.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille et lui permettent d'épargner à chaque réunion.
texts.en:
This group is composed of 20 women all from the same village. They live in the same town and are developing good friendly relations.

The group's representative, Mame Diarra, is a married woman, 39 years old, who has six children, including four boys. She has a small-scale business selling cloth. She also raises animals and is a farmer. In the photo, she is the one standing at the right wearing orange.

With her loan, she would like to purchase 10 rolls of 'maylous' cloth, 1 basin, and 5 head of sheep to fatten. 

With the profits, she helps out her husband in covering family expenses. The profits enable her to save money at every group meeting.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and animals to raise and sell

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Norma es una clienta de primer crédito con Afodenic, de 39 años de edad es casada y con 3 hijos estudiantes que dependen de ella y su esposo quien la apoya con los gastos del hogar con su salario, doña norma tiene una pulpería hace 1 año lo que forma parte de la economía familiar como sostén del hogar, solicita un crédito de 16000 córdobas para la compra de productos lácteos, granos básicos, golosinas, bebidas refrescantes entre otros para invertir en su venta de esta manera poder ofrecer un mejor ingreso económico a la familia y lograr que sus hijos culminen una carera profesional.
texts.en: Norma is a first-time loan client with Afodenic. She is 39 and is married with three children, all of whom study and are dependent on her and her husband. Norma's husband helps her with the household expenses with his salary. A year ago Norma started a small general store, which helps with the family's finances to support the household. She is requesting a loan of 16,000 córdobas to buy dairy products, grains, sweets, soft drinks and other items. By investing in her business in this way she will be able to provide a higher income for her family, as well as enabling her children to finish their professional training.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, grains, sweets, soft drinks and other items

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Doña María Auxiliadora de 41 años de edad, clienta habitante de la ciudad capital, su esposo ahora trabaja como tecnico en telecomunicaciones, ella es bien esforzada, ha salido adelante con su trabajo de estilista y con el apoyo que su esposo le brinda han ido construyendo poco a poco su casa para ofrecer una mejor comodidad a su único hijo quien está estudiando y a sus clientes, pero continúan con las mejoras de su vivienda ya que todo es poco a poco por la falta de suficiente capital ahora está optando a su catorceavo crédito con Afodenic, en esta ocasión pondrá el piso de su casa de cerámica por lo que necesita comprar lo mencionado, masía para el pegado, cemento y el pago de la mano de obra.
texts.en:
María Auxiliadora is 41 years old and lives in the capital city.  Her husband works in telecommunications.  She is very hard-working and has gotten ahead through her work as a stylist.  With her husband's support, she has been building her house little by little in order to give her only son, who is studying, as well as her clients, greater comfort.

She and her husband continue to make improvements to their housing since everything has to be done a little at a time due to insufficient funds.  She is now requesting her fourteenth loan in order to put in a ceramic tile floor, for which she needs to purchase putty and cement, and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy cement, ceramics, putty and to cover labor costs

loans.name: Eduarda

texts.es:
Eduarda es una mujer de 62 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ella tiene tres hijos, que ya son mayores de edad, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente Eduarda sufrió la pérdida de su amado esposo, desde entonces ella es el pilar más grande de su familia; Eduarda no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de Enfermería, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer sombreros de pasa y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco de Carnero para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace varios años Eduarda puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de bebidas y los fines de semana vende comida, como el delicioso caldo de gallina y la riquísima chanfainita, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su rica sazón y por la experiencia que tiene en su negocio.
Eduarda se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como gaseosas, refrescos, cervezas, entre otras, así también podrá comprar insumos para la preparación de sus riquísimos potajes; de esta manera Eduarda espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder ampliar su negocio y en un futuro no muy lejano desea poder terminar la construcción de la parte trasera de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Eduarda is a 62-year-old woman who lives in the city of Chincha. She has three grown-up children whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. Sadly Eduarda lost her dear husband, and since then has been the main pillar of her family. Eduarda was not able to undertake further education as she had to work to help her parents from a young age, but she would have liked to study nursing. In her free time she likes to make straw hats and she sometimes cooks a delicious lamb stew to share with her family.

On her own initiative, with much determination and dedication, Eduarda started a small business selling drinks several years ago. At the weekend she also sells food, such as her delicious chicken soup and chanfainita [a kind of beef stew]. She starts work early every morning and works for around 10 hours. She thinks she is doing well thanks to her delicious seasoning and the experience she has of running her business.

Eduarda is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because the help she receives will enable her to buy merchandise such as sodas, soft drinks and beer, among other items, as well as ingredients to prepare her delicious soups and stews. In this way Eduarda hopes to increase her sales and her income, which will help her to grow her business. In the not too distant future she would like to finish the building work at the back of her home.

loans.use: to buy drinks and ingredients

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise, a display cabinet and a counter.

loans.name: Rosa Lina

texts.es: Doña Rosa Lina es habitante del municipio de san Ignacio, su esposo labora como chofer y con esos ingresos le apoya en los gastos del hogar deseando que un futuro sus condiciones de vida sean mejores, ella desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, en su trayecto la dificultad más grande que ha tenido es la falta de capital de trabajo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, pero ahora con la oportunidad que le brinda AFODENIC a través de KIVA le es más fácil seguir adelante  con este primer financiamiento solicitado para surtir en su venta con papayas, melones, bananos, naranjas, papas, pipianes, piñas, zanahorias, yucas, bananos entre otros para comercializarlas en diversos departamentos del país y así obtener mejor economía para sus hijos y familia.
texts.en: Rosa Lina lives in the municipality of San Ignacio. Her husband works as a driver, and with this income he helps her with the household expenses, hoping that, at some time in the future, their standard of living will improve. She has been involved in the sale of fruit and vegetables for many years. During this time her biggest difficulty has been the lack of working capital in order to continue investing in her business. However, now with the opportunity that AFODENIC offers via Kiva, it is easier to go ahead with this first loan, which she has requested to supply her small shop with papayas, melons, bananas, oranges, potatoes, chilies, pineapples, carrots, yuccas, and bananas, among other things. She will then sell these items in several provinces of the country and, in this way, achieve a better standard of living for her children and family.

loans.use: To buy papayas, melons, bananas, oranges, potatoes, chilies, pineapples, carrots, yuccas, and bananas.

loans.name: Rolando Alcides

texts.es:
Rolando es un hombre de 45 años, se encuentra felizmente casado, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y sus cuatro pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amble, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; Rolando no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera de Mecánica Automotriz, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos, y en algunas ocasiones su esposa lo engríe cocinando un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo.
Con mucho empeño, dedicación y gracias al apoyo de un amigo, Rolando puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de servicio de duplicado de llaves, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él pude trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su calidad y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Rolando se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que podrá realizar el pintado y tarrajeo de su vivienda; de esta manera Rolando espera contar con un ambiente más adecuado y seguro donde su familia pueda vivir sin correr riesgos, así él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su sueño de tener su propia ferretería y ver convertido a sus hijos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Rolando is a 45-year-old, happily married man. He lives in the town of Pucallpa with his wife and four small children, whom he loves dearly and who are his main reason for living. He is a friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who, together with his wife, dedicates all of his efforts to ensure that his family get ahead. Rolando was not able to study to become a professional because, from a very young age, he had to work, in order to help his parents with the household expenses. However, he would very much have liked to have been able to study to be a car mechanic. In his free time he likes to play football with his friends and neighbours, and sometimes his wife spoils him and cooks him delicious chicken with rice.

With a lot of determination and dedication, and thanks to the help of a friend, Rolando set up his small business cutting keys. He starts work early in the morning every day. He has about 10 hours of work, and thinks that his business is going well because of the quality of his work and the friendly way he deals with his customers.

Rolando is very grateful for the Kiva loans, as thanks to the help that they provide, he will be able to make some improvements to his home by painting and decorating it. In this way, Rolando hopes to provide a more adequate and safe environment, where his family can live safely. In this way, he will continue working and striving to achieve his dream of owning his own hardware store and of seeing his children grow up to be good professionals.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for his candy store

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es: El joven Oscar de 27 años de edad habitante del municipio de ticuantepe junto a su mama, es soltero su sueño más grande es poder construir una casita en un futuro para ser independiente, trabaja para una empresa privada y con sus ingresos le apoya a su madre con los gastos del hogar, el crédito solicitado es para realizar un cuarto para tener un poco mas de privacidad, dicha inversión no la puede cubrir de una sola vez porque su salario es muy bajo por lo que con el financiamiento comprara todos los materiales necesario para empezar la obra como son: cemento, arena, hierro, bloques, y pagara la mano de obra, agradece el apoyo y la confianza que le brinda Kiva a través de Afodenic para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Oscar is a young 27-year-old man, and lives in the district of Ticuantepe with his mother. He is single. His biggest dream is to be able to build a little house, at some time in the future, in order to be independent. He works for a private company, and with his income he helps his mother with the household expenses. 

The loan that Oscar has applied for is to build a room in order to have a little more privacy. He cannot finance this investment all in one go, because his wages are very low. Consequently, with this loan, he intends to buy all the materials necessary to start the job: - cement, sand, steel and blocks, and he will also pay for the labour. He is grateful for the support and trust that Kiva, via Afodenic, place in him, enabling him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, steel and blocks, and to pay labour expenses

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 32 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete en el distrito de Imperial con su madre y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, lamentablemente José no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, él es una persona que ha trabajado desde muy joven, en especial por varios años se dedico al rubro de la construcción, en donde le fue bien y pudo ahorrar el dinero necesario para comprar su propia mototaxi.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana sale a recorrer las calles de su distrito en búsqueda de pasajeros, él brinda servicios de transporte en su mototaxi, José pude trabajar un aproximado de 1 horas diarias y cree que le va bien porque es conocido en la zona y brinda un buen servicio a sus clientes.
José se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento de su mototaxi, ya que desea poder hacer refacciones al motor, tapizado y comprar llantas nuevas para su vehículo; de esta manera José tendrá su mototaxi en mejores condiciones, con ello espera poder seguir trabajando y atendiendo a mayor cantidad de clientes para poder aumentar sus ingresos, así él seguirá esforzándose y trabajando para lograr su sueño de tener su propia empresa constructora y tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
José is a 32-year-old, single man who lives with his mother and siblings in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial. He is a kind, hardworking, and enthusiastic person with dreams of excelling. Unfortunately, José was not able to study a professional career because he had to begin working at a very young age. He started working in construction and, when times were good, he put away money he later used to buy his own motor rickshaw. 

With much determination and dedication, José leaves early each morning to travel the streets of Imperial in search of passengers. José believes he has been successful so far because he is well-known in the area and always makes sure to deliver good service to his passengers.

José is very grateful to Kiva lenders because with the help of this loan, he will be able to pay for the regular maintenance of his vehicle. He will make repairs on his motor, redo the upholstery, and put new tires on his motor rickshaw. With a better vehicle, José hopes to get more passengers and increase his profits. In this way, he will continue working and making an effort to realize his dream of one day owning his own construction company and his own house.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his motor rickshaw.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto es un hombre de 67 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, tiene tres hijos que ya son mayores de edad y a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, lamentablemente por diversas razones desde hace varios años se separó de su esposa; Roberto no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera de soldadura de vehículos, en sus ratos libres le gusta asistir a la iglesia para agradecer a Dios por todas las bendiciones que le ha dado y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Roberto puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de pescado seco, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas, donde puede atender a un promedio de 15 clientes y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y buena atención que brinda a sus clientes.
Roberto se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mas pescado para su abastecer su negocio; de esta manera Roberto espera aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda ampliar su negocio y así surgir cada día al lado de su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto is a 67-year-old man living in the city of Pucallpa. He has 3 children who are already grown and whom he loves – they are his principal reason for living. He is a very friendly, hard-working, and enthusiastic person who has dedicated all his efforts to advancing his family. Lamentably, for diverse reasons, for several years now, he has been separated from his wife. Roberto was unable to pursue professional studies but he would have liked very much to have studied vehicle welding. In his free time he likes to attend church to thank God for all the blessings he has been given and, on some occasions, he cooks a rich Rice with Chicken to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with much effort and dedication, Roberto launched his small business selling dried fish. He initiates work every day from the early hours of the morning. Roberto works approximately 8 hours, during which time he attends to an average of 15 customers, and he believes that the business is going well, due to his good prices and the service he offers his customers.

Roberto is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, due to their help, he has been able to purchase more fish to supply his business. In this manner, Roberto hopes to augment his sales and increase his income, which will serve greatly to, little by little, expand business and help him and his family advance daily.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Twitange Group

texts.en:
Abdurazaki, who is in his late 30s, is married with two children who are still going to school.  He has been selling fruits and vegetables for one year now.  He works from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to buy more fruits and vegetables to resell and has been able to pay back his loan successfully.  His dream is to one day be able to expand his business and to improve his business premises.
 
Abdurazaki will share this loan with his loan group, Twitange, which has a total of 10 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Sunguchini Group

texts.en:
Richardi, who is in his late 20s, is married with one child, who goes to school.  

He has been selling food for three years now. He works from 9 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which he wants to use for buying a fridge and to restock the inventory in his food store. His dream is to one day be able to open a grocery store.

Richardi will share this loan with his loan group "Sunguchini," which has a total of 10 members who hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a fridge and to restock the inventory in his food store.

loans.name: Malila Group

texts.en:
Renatus, who in his early 40s, is married with three children who are still going to school. He has been running a fruit and vegetable business for two years now. He works from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be his 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to buy more fruits and vegetables, kerosine, wheat flour, sugar, backing flour, and beans, and has paid back his loan successfully. He wants a loan to increase his business stock. His dream is to one day be able to build his own house.

Renatus will share this loan with his loan group "Malila," which has a total of 21 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase his business stock.

loans.name: Umoja Kigogo Group

texts.en:
Linda, who is in her early 30s, is married and living with her husband with a girl of one year old. She has been selling clothes (fabrics), cultural sandoes (a kind of shoes made by using animal skin), and other cultural wearings for four years now. She works from 7 AM to 6 PM daily and she is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to increase her business stock to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to expand her business.

Linda will share this loan with her loan group "Umoja Kigogo," which totals 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her business stock to resell.

loans.name: Upendo Kigogo Group

texts.en:
Fatuma, who is in her early 60s, is a widow living with some of her relatives in her house. Fatuma had nine children, six of which died, and the remaining are adults and depend upon themselves. She has had two businesses: Genge business selling fruits and vegetables and bodaboda (motorcycle services), for three years now. She works from 9AM to 7PM daily and she is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to buy more fruits and vegetables to increase sales. Her dream is to one day be able to repair her house to look nice.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Upendo Kigogo," which totals 15 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetable to increase sales.

loans.name: Hilda Sofia

texts.es: Doña Hilda de 36 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de Managua, es casada y con tres hijos de las edades de 19,13 y un tierno de 9 meses de nacido, los dos mayores estudian ella vende cosméticos y ropa aproximadamente 5 años en esta labor cotidiana para el sustento diario del hogar en conjunto con su esposo. Esta es su primer experiencia crediticia con AFODENIC para realizar la construcción del muro frontal de su vivienda por lo que necesita comprar cemento, bloques, arena, hierro, alambre de amarre, tablones y el pago de la mano de obra, solo con apoyo del financiamiento podrá realizar esta obra de un solo ya que no cuenta con capital suficiente, pero con el préstamo se le facilita un poco más, el cual es un beneficio para su familia para vivir en  mejores condiciones.
texts.en: Hilda is 36 years old and a resident of the city of Managua.  She is married with three children aged 19, 13 and a 9-month-old baby.  The two older children are students.  Hilda has been working daily for approximately five years selling cosmetics and clothing, in order to provide for her family along with her husband.  This is her first loan with AFODENIC.  With this loan she will build a front wall for her house, for which she needs to buy cement, blocks, sand, iron, wire tires and planks and to pay for the labor.  Only with the support of financing will she be able to carry out this work, since she does not have sufficient capital.  However, with the loan it will be a little easier, and it will benefit her family by allowing them to live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, blocks, sand, iron, wire ties and planks and to pay for the labor to build a front wall for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a room on the ground level.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: El señor Luis, es una persona de 44 años de edad de estado civil soltero pero vive en concubinato, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive en su propio domicilio, cuenta con tres dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos; la actividad económica a la que se dedica es la producción agrícola; producen papa, haba, arveja y zanahoria en sus propias parcelas los mismos que cuentan con riego por inundación y aspersión que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de K'ayarani del municipio de Tíraque distante desde la ciudad de Cochabamba sobre la carretera antigua a Santa Cruz en el Km. 89. Y finalmente el cliente y su familia manifiestan tener el deseo de mejorar e incrementar su producción agrícola y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital  de inversión para realizar la compra de insumos agrícolas que a mediano plazo le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos que van a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Luis is 44 years old and single, but in a common-law relationship.  Luis finished elementary school and lives in his own home.  He has three children who are financially dependent on him.  

Luis engages in farming activities such as growing potatoes, beans, peas, and carrots on land that he owns.  He waters his crops by utilizing the irrigation and sprinkler systems that are shared within the community of K’ayarari in the town of Tíraque.  This area is located quite some distance from the city of Cochabamba, specifically at Km. 89 along the old highway to Santa Cruz.  

Luis and his family say that they want to improve and increase their farming production.  In order for this to happen, they need to request investment capital for buying farming supplies.  By obtaining a loan in this manner, he will be able to generate more income so that he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es: Rubén vive en la Zona de Sacaba una provincia de la Ciudad de Cochabamba, el Señor Rubén tiene tres hijas está casada con la Señora Paola. Rubén es tiene la profesión de mecánico  y de la misma manera tiene un taxi con el cual realiza también trabajos por la noche, él tuvo una niñez muy difícil ya que su padre murió cuando él era un niño y desde entonces tuvo que ayudar a la madre en la crianza de los hermanos pequeños y el empezó a trabajar como ayudante de un mecánico y después estudiaba por la noche y de esa manera pudo terminar el colegio y hacer una pequeña carrera de mecánico  y su esposa trabaja como cuidadora de unas personas mayores. Él solicita el crédito para poder hacer cambio de motor a su vehículo ya que también este es otro ingreso extra que tiene el para poder así de esa manera cumplir con la educación y alimentación de su familia, al mismo tiempo el Señor Rubén quiere terminar de estudiar la carrera de Odontología, Rubén y la Señora Paola trabajan en doble turno para poder tener mayores ingresos y que sus hijas terminen el colegio, como también realicen una carrera. Rubén es una persona responsable y trabajadora.
texts.en:
Rubén lives in Sacaba, one of the provincial districts in the city of Cochabamba.  He is married to Sra. Paola and they have three daughters.  Rubén is a mechanic by profession, but he also owns a taxi so that he can work at night.  He had a very difficult childhood since his father died when he was a boy.  At that point, he had to help his mother raise his younger siblings.  Rubén began working as a mechanic’s assistant and then studied at night so that he could finish high school and complete a short program in auto repairs.  His wife works as a caregiver for elderly people.  

Rubén is requesting a loan so that he can replace the engine of his vehicle since this is the means by which he is able to earn the extra income he needs to complete his education and feed his family.  He wants to finish a degree in Dentistry.  Rubén and Sra. Paola are working double shifts so that they can have more income to help their daughters finish school and pursue degrees of their own.  Rubén is a responsible and hardworking individual.

loans.use: to replace the engine of his taxi.

loans.name: Hermes

texts.es: El Señor Hermes tiene 29 años de edad vive en Chimoré del departamento de Cochabamba es agricultor y se empeña mucho en su actividad ya que aprendió de su padre y hermano todo lo que empíricamente sabe hasta ahora. Hermes es una persona sencilla y siempre estuvo acostumbrado a la labor del campo, cuando era muy joven tuvo que afrontar la vida muy duramente ya que sufrió varias estafas cuando tenia algo para invertir los socios que consiguió siempre aprovechaban de el sin dejarle alguna utilidad o por lo menso que recuperara su inversión, ahora el esta mas estable ya que pidió ayuda a su familia y le hicieron recuperar sus perdidas, se entero de lo créditos Kiva y solicita para poder pagar la mano de obra y algunos insumos que se necesitan en su chaco es soltero pero sueña con tener una familia y brindarles todo lo mejor que pueda.
texts.en:
Sr. Hermes is 29 years old and lives in Chimoré, which is in the Department of Cochabamba.  He is a hardworking farmer who learned everything he knows about his trade to date from his father and brother.  

Hermes is a simple person who has always been used to working in the field.  At a very young age, he had to confront some very difficult situations in his life.  On several occasions, he participated in investment opportunities and was taken advantage by the other partners since they did leave not leave him any profits or allow him to recover his original investment.  

His situation today is much more stable since he has requested assistance from his family to help him recoup his losses.  Hermes learned about the Kiva loans, so he is requesting one so that he can pay for labor and a few supplies that he needs for cultivating his land.  He is single, but dreams about having a family and providing them the best that he can offer.

loans.use: to pay for labor and to purchase a few farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for renovations to his bedroom.

loans.name: El Laural Group

texts.es: Formado por cuatro  socios emprendedores con cinco años de estar trabajando con la institución una de ellas es Jilma del Carmen que se dedica a vender comida y fritanga por las noches en su casa, actualmente brinda servicios de alquiler de unos pequeños módulos para negocio, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, aceite, frijoles, carne de res, carne de pollo etc. Yalila Damaris vende ropa usada y calzados en su domicilio y junto a su esposo tienen una moto caponera que brinda servicio de transporte a la comunidad y parte de préstamo a invertido en el mantenimiento de la moto taxi que le genera otros ingresos, Marlene del Socorro vende nacatamales los fines de semana y Mauricio tiene un cyber café desde hace varios años el crédito lo solicita para la compra de dos computadoras y cambio de accesorios que están en mal estado y brindar un mejor servicio a la clientela.
texts.en:
This group consists of four entrepreneurs who have worked with ADIM for the past five years.  One of them is Jilma del Carmen, who sells meals and fried foods from her house at night.  At the moment, she also rents out a few small rooms as a side business.  Her loan will be invested in the purchase of basic grains such as rice, as well as oil, beans, beef, chicken, and other items.  

Yalila Damaris sells used clothing and shoes from her home.  She and her husband have a small van that they use to provide transportation services in their community.  Part of her loan will be invested in the maintenance of her taxi so that she can generate additional income.

Marline del Socorro sells Nicaraguan tamales on the weekends.

Mauricio has owned a cybercafé for several years.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy two computers and to replace accessories that are in bad condition.  This improve the service to his customers.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, beans, beef, chicken, and other items.

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 54 años de edad, es comerciante de ropa en su casa de habitación y también sale a vender sus productos a la calle, tiene 4 hijos todos mayores y profesionales, la única  dificultad que ha tenido fue cuando falleció su esposo pero gracias a la ayuda de Dios logro salir adelante con sus hijos superando esa pérdida tan grande, ahora en sus planes está el mejorar las condiciones de su casa para tener una vivienda digna y mejor por eso ella solicita apoyo de un primer crédito para realizar mejoras en un cuarto de su vivienda y los  materiales que necesita comprar para dicho objetivo son: bloques, cemento, arena, láminas de zinc, hojas de plywood y el pago de la mano de obra, con esto podrá realizar la obra gracias al financiamiento ya que ella no puede cubrir este gasto de un solo pago.
texts.en: Doña Rosa is 54 years old. She sells clothing in her home and she also goes out to sell her products on the street. She has four children, all of whom are adults and have careers. The only difficulty that she has had was when her husband died, but thanks to the help of God, she managed to advance, along with her children, overcoming this great loss. Now it is in her plans to improve the condition of her house to have a worthy and better residence. For this she is applying for her first loan to make improvements in a room of her house. The materials that she needs to buy for this purpose are blocks, cement, sand, sheets of zinc, and plywood, and she needs to pay for labor. With this she will be able to do the work, thanks to the financing, since she is not able to cover this expense in a single payment.

loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, sand, sheets of zinc, and plywood and pay for labor

loans.name: Adriana

texts.es:
Adriana es una mujer de 65 años, se encuentra felizmente casada, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposo y sus dos hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo han dedicado todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Adriana no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocina, en especial uno riquísimo Chicharrones de Pollo para engreír a su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, desde hace muchos años Adriana se dedica a la agricultura, ella trabaja en su pequeña parcela donde cultiva uva, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia sus labores de campo, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por las enseñanzas que le dejaron sus padres.
Adriana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias  a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mantenimiento de su cosecha, tanto de riego, abono, limpieza y otros; de esta manera Adriana tendrá su cultivo en buenas condiciones, asegurando así su buen desarrollo, con ella espera poder lograr una buena cosecha para así poder venderla a un buen precio, así Adriana espera seguir trabajando y tener una larga vida al lado de su querida familia.
texts.en:
Adriana, 65, is happily married.  She lives in the city of Ica with her husband and their two children, the heart and soul of her life.  Adriana is a happy and enthusiastic person.  She and her husband have worked hard all their lives to make a better life for their family.  She would have liked to have studied for a career but, unfortunately, she had to leave school early.  In her spare time, she likes to cook, and she tells us that chicharrones de pollo is a special favorite for her family.
Adriana has a farming business that she has worked hard to build over many years.  She grows grapes, working on her small farm every day, from early in the morning.  She likes the work and says that she's successful because she learned farming from her parents and has worked at it all of her life.  
Adrian is grateful to Kiva lenders because their help will provide the funds she needs to maintain her crop: irrigating it, fertilizing it, weeding it, etc.  The investment will allow her to harvest a good crop and continue developing her business.  For the future, Adriana hopes to continue working and live for many years more at the side of her beloved family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her farming business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock his grocery business.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: El señor Miguel es casado, su esposa es profesora trabaja en un colegio de la ciudad, tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad, Miguel se dedica a la actividad de taxista por mas de 2 años,viene realizando esta labor, trabajando en el cercado de Ica y también para los hoteles brindándole servicio a los turistas,los desafíos que enfrenta es estas en taxi todo el día y aveces hasta de madrugada para ganar un poco mas de dinero para el bienestar de su familia, el crédito que Miguel esta muy agradecido a los prestamistas Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su apoyo y gracias a ello el podrá mejorar su negocio de bodega, ya que realizara tarrajeo de paredes y comprar mercadería para su negocio, lo que le permitira mejorar sus ingresos y luchar para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Terminar de construir su casa, y adquirir otra movilidad para así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia".
texts.en:
Miguel is a married man whose wife is a teacher in a school in the city.  He has a three-year-old son.  Miguel has been a taxi driver for over 2 years, working in and around Ica and also offering his services to tourists in the city's hotels.

The challenge he faces is that he is in the taxi all day, and sometimes until the early hours of the morning, in order to earn a little more money to cater for his family's well-being.  Miguel is very grateful to Kiva lenders for his loan, as  this is the second time that he has received their support.  The loan will enable him to improve his grocery business by cementing over the walls and buying stock, which will allow him to improve his income and strive to realise his greatest dream: "To finish building his house and buy another vehicle so as to improve his family's quality of life".

loans.use: To buy stock and cement

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Invertir en compra de equipo y partes para computadoras

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: La Señora Margarita Es casada esta pensionada, su esposo tiene un negocio propio que es un taller eléctrico  La Señora Margarita tiene un pequeño negocio de ropa usada ya tiene varios años con su negocio y hasta ahorita a funcionado muy bien en esta ocasion esta pidiendo un prestamo para comprar mas ropa de temporada y  tener mucho mejor su negocio y asi aumentar un poco mas sus ganancias desea contar con el apoyo de kiva.
texts.en:
Margarita is married, her husband is an electrician and owns his own business.  Margarita has a small used clothing business, and she has been running it successfully for many years..  

She is asking for a loan to buy more clothes that are currently in style and therefore increase her sales and profit.  She hopes for lender support from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Bertha Adilia

texts.es: Doña Bertha de 40 años, su compañero de vida albañil trabaja por su cuenta propia, tienen tres hijos el mayor de 18 años ya trabaja, estudia y le ayuda a ellos, su negocio es venta de ropa, calzado, cosméticos, electrodomésticos, este quinto crédito lo necesita para surtir con todo lo mencionado, con las inversiones que ha hecho le ha ayudado un poco a mejorar su vida, con ahorros ganancias y mejor comodidad para su hogar, ella espera seguir invirtiendo en el negocio, aumentar sus clientes, también trabaja en una distribuidora de alli allí obtiene otros ingresos para lograr un equilibrio en los gastos, ella desea que sus hijos aprovechen sus estudios y se superen.
texts.en:
Doña Bertha is 40 years old. Her partner is a self employed construction worker, and they have three children. The oldest, who is 18 and already working, studies, and helps them.Their business is selling clothes, footwear, cosmetics and domestic appliances. 

She needs this fifth loan to stock up on these goods. The investments she has already made have helped to improve her life, by saving their earnings and making their home more comfortable. She hopes to continue investing in the business and gain more customers. 

She also works at a wholesaler there. There she earns more money so that she can break even with the expenses. She wants her children to make the most of their studies and better themselves.

loans.use: to buy clothes, footwear, cosmetics and domestic appliances.

loans.name: Eufemio Nicolas
