To better feed the family, Mom has been involved in growing rice on 2 hectares of farmland and cassava and rubber on 6 hectares of farmland. Having been in the business for twenty-four years, she can make a daily income from her current business of 50,000 KHR. She is able to save about 20,000 KHR per day after expenses for her family's future needs.

Mom has been with VisionFund for two cycles and completely repaid back her past loans, which have helped her relieve her family’s burdens and improve their livelihood. Now she is leading her group of four to request a new loan. Mom, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farm; she will also use a portion of it to buy rubber seedlings for her rubber planting business. She hopes to gain a high crop yields from her plantation business, which she can sell for a good price. She will use the profits to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sithou's Group

texts.en:
Sithou is a 34-year-old mother of five children. She earns a living through farming rice, and her husband plants cassava to gain extra income to support the family. She has been in this business for fifteen years, and it earns her about 21,000 KHR per day. All of her children are still in school. 

Sithou’s group consists of two members who live in the same village. She is in her first loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan. Sithou will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farm; he will also use a portion of it to pay for labor. She hopes to increase her family’s income from her current business to reach a higher standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farm.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Nang's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house located in Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district, Nang is now 22 years old, married, and a mother of two sons. Nang and her husband are farmers who plant cassava as their main business to support the family, and she supplements the family’s income by selling grocery items. Having been in the business for five years, they are able to make daily earnings of 44,000KHR and manage to save about 20,000KHR each day after offsetting expenses. Low yield resulting from flood is the main challenge for her farming business.

Now leading her group of three to request their first loan with Kiva’s partner VisionFund, Nang will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and buy piglets to raise to earn additional income for the family. Nang hopes this loan will enable her to grow her crops healthily to make more income to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland.

loans.name: Ulugbek

texts.ru: Улугбек молодой парень .   Он  очень трудолюбивый и  добрый человек.    Улугбек не женат, но он помогает своим родителям.   По семейным обстоятельствам он не смог учиться и теперь вынужден заниматься только животноводством.   Улугбек откармливает скот дома. Куплей продажей занимается тоже сам.  Этим видом    деятельности  он занимается более пяти лет.    Дома Улугбек имеет 7-голов крупно рогатого скота .  Это их единственный доход и  для него этот бизнес очень важен.    Улугбек старается развивать свой бизнес  и на полученный кредит планирует купить крупно рогатый скот.   Он заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Ulugbek is a young man. He is a very hardworking and kind person. Ulugbek is not married, but he helps his parents. For family reasons, he was unable to study and now has to deal only with animal husbandry. Ulugbek feeds the cattle at home. He is also involved in buying and selling. He has been engaged in this activity for more than five years. Ulugbek's household has seven head of cattle. It is their only income and for him, this business is very important. Ulugbek tries to grow his business and on receiving the loan, plans to buy cattle. He thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Chita's Group

texts.en:
Chita is 33 years old and married with seven dependent children, all of whom are still in school. She and her husband have worked very hard for ten years to support their big family by farming rice and working as paid workers in the local area. The current business earns them about KHR 36,000 per day and they manage to save about KHR 20,000 each day after expenses. The main challenge for her farming business is drought. 

Chita’s group consists of two members who have been with VisionFund for two cycles and completely paid back the past loans which have helped her better support her current business. Now she is leading her group to request another loan of KHR2,000,000 each. Chita, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice healthfully and in a timely way so as to sell it for a good price to improve her standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Sinoun

texts.en:
Aged 29 years, Sinoun is married and lives with her family in a rural area located in the Sampov Meas district of Pursat province. She is a mother of one son, who is dependent and still too young for school. She earns a living through farming rice, which she had been doing for six years, while her husband plants corn and beans to help support the family. Together, she and her husband can earn about 20,000 KHR per day from the current business and are able to save about 10,000 KHR each day for the future. Drought is the main challenge for her farming business. 

This is the first loan for Sinoun with VisionFund. Now she is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 KHR with VisionFund and she is going to use this loan to buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticides for her plantation and use a portion of it spend on labor costs. This loan will enable her to increase her rice farming production to improve her family’s living conditions, and also hopes to send and keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticides for her plantation

loans.name: Sem

texts.en:
Sem lives in a rural village of the Bakan district of Pursat province, Cambodia. She is 59 years old and married with nine children, one of whom is still in school in the local area. To support her family, she has been working as a rice farmer for more than three years while her husband raises cows and buffalos. The current business earns her about US$7 per day to make a living and she can afford to save US$3 each day after expenses. Low crop yield as a result of drought and insects has been still a challenge for her business.
 
Sem has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for two cycles and fully paid back the past loans. She has wisely and successfully used the previous loans to enable her to buy a pumping machine for carrying water for her rice paddy. Now she is applying for a loan with VisionFund of US$625. With this loan, she is going to buy a decent motor vehicle for her family. She hopes this loan will enable her to have a motorbike as means of transportation to reduce traveling time.

loans.use: To buy a decent motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Samearn

texts.en:
Samearn is 33 years old. She lives with her husband and two children in a rural area of the Ponchea Krek District of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. Both of her children (one daughter and one son) are dependent on her and still in school. She has been engaged in rice farming on five hectares of farmland for thirteen years to support her family. Besides this, she also buys garbage for resale to better support her family. The current business earns her about US$11 per day and she manages to save about US$6 each day after offsetting daily expenses. 

Samearn has been with VisionFund for two loan cycles and fully paid back the past loans which have helped her relieve her family’s burden and support her children’s education. Now she is applying for a loan with VisionFund of US$1500. With this loan, she is going to buy a plot of farmland for her farming business. She hopes this loan will enable her to extend her rice field, and she hopes to grow her rice on time and fruitfully so as to improve her lifestyle and also keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy a plot of farmland for her farming business

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sokha's Group

texts.en:
Sokha, a resident of the Ponhea Krek District of Kampong Cham Province, is a 41-year-old married mother of two children, one of whom is still dependent and in school. She and her husband have struggled to feed their family. They have been farming rice on 1.5 hectares of farmland, growing cassava on 1 hectare of farmland and raising pigs for thirteen years. Sometimes, they supplement their income by working for others for a fee. The current business earns her family about 46,000 KHR per day and they manage to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

This is the first microloan for Sokha’s group with VisionFund. She is leading her group to request a loan of 500,000 KHR and 1,000,000 KHR respectively. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer for her rice and cassava business. Sokha hopes this loan will enable her to increase her income to improve her family’s standard of living and keep her child in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her rice and cassava business.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Diana Esperanza

texts.es: Diana tiene 27 años de edad es casada tiene 1 hijo que estudia en una escuela pública cerca de su casa. Comenzó su negocio hace 5 años atrás con la crianza de pollos y después lo vende en un mercado cerca de su casa. Su mayor dificultad es cuando se le enferman los pollos y muchas veces terminan muriéndose. Ella trabaja sola, alimenta a sus pollo todos los dias  desde a  la 8 de la mañana. Con el préstamo comprar más pollos para la crianza. Su sueño es hacer su casa de cemento y que su negocio crezca cada dia mas.
texts.en:
Diana is 27 years old, married, and has one child that studies in a public school near her home.  She began her business 5 years ago by raising chickens and then selling them in the market near her home.  Her greatest difficulty is when the chickens get sick and many times they end up dying.  She works alone, feeding her chickens everyday from 8 in the morning.  

With the loan, she will buy more chickens to raise.  Her dream is the make her house out of cement and that her business will grow more each day.

loans.use: to buy more chickens

loans.name: Erminger Gardel

texts.es: Erminger tiene 57 años de edad es casado tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad por lo que son independientes. El comenzó a buscar trabaja hace 5 años atrás pero por su edad nadie le daba un puesto de trabajo, fue entonces que decidió tener su negocio propio. En la actualidad Erminger tiene una tienda de víveres en general. El trabaja solo de lunes a sábado atendiendo su negocio desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, azúcar, leche etc. Su sueño es poder construir su propia casa y arreglar el negocio
texts.en: Erminger is 57 years old, married, and has two adult children who live independently.  He started looking for work five years ago but, owing to his age, nobody would give him a job.  He decided, therefore, to set up his own business.  Erminger currently has a general store.  He works alone, from Monday to Saturday, serving in his business from 8.00am to 10.00pm.  He would like to use his loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, etc.  His dream is to be able to build his own home and fix up his business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, etc.

loans.name: Veronica Patricia

texts.es: Verónica tiene 27 años de edad es casada tiene2 hijos que estudian en una escuela pública. Ella empezó vendiendo artefactos por catálogos. En la actualidad ella vende mercadería como   ropa, sabanas, licuadoras. Con el préstamo comprara ropa sabanas licuadoras etc. Su meta es poder tener un comercial de artículos varios y tener mercadería bien surtida para satisfacer la clientela y logar el sueño de terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Verónica, age 27, is married and has two children who go to a public school.

She started selling appliances by catalog.  She currently sells merchandise like clothes, sheets, and blenders.  With the loan she will buy clothes, sheets, and blenders, etc.

Her goal is to be able to have a business selling various appliances, to have well-stocked merchandise in order to meet customer demand, and to fulfill her dream of finishing her house.

loans.use: to buy clothes, sheets, and blenders, etc.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: Mariano tiene 62 años de edad es divorciado y tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad. Mariano hace 5 años atrás perdió su empleo, tiempo después él quería conseguir un puesto de trabajo pero ya nadie lo aceptaba en ninguna empresa   por su edad fue entonces que con la ayuda de sus hijos se compro un carro. En la actualidad el trabja como conductor de su taxi, de lunes a domingo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche. Con el préstamo comprara llantas, y sacara la renovación de su matrícula de conducir. Su meta es comprarse otro carro.
texts.en: Mariano is 62 years of age, he is divorced, and has two adult children. Five years ago, Mariano lost his job [and] after [this occurred] he wanted to find a job but nobody would accept him at any company due to his age.  It was then, with the help of his children, that he bought a car.  Today, he works as a taxi driver from Monday to Sunday, seven in the morning until seven at night.   With the loan, he will buy tires and renew his driver's registration.  His goal is to buy another car.

loans.use: to purchase tires and renew his driver's registration.

loans.name: Gilson William

texts.es: Gilson tiene  21 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos. Comenzó hace 3 años trabaja creando artículos decorativos para el hogar son trabajos manuales  que realiza.En la actualidad el trabaja todos los días desde la 9 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde los fines de semana los vende .Con el préstamo Gilson comprara materiales para sus manualidades. Sus aspiraciones a futuro es poder dar clases a personas interesadas con las manualidades de artículos decorativos.
texts.en: Gilson is 21 years old, single, and has no children. Three years ago he started his business making handmade decorative crafts for home decoration. Nowadays he works from 9 in the morning until 4 in the evening during the week and sells them on the weekend. With this loan, Gilson will purchase materials for his crafts. He aspires to one day be able to lead classes on making decorative crafts for those interested in learning.

loans.use: to purchase material for his crafts.

loans.name: Vanessa Rocio

texts.es:
Vanessa vive en la ciudad La Libertad de la provincia de Santa Elena. Ella tiene 25 años de edad es madre soltera tiene  1 hija de 6 años que asiste a una escuela publica. Ella Ha trabajado en su propia tienda general durante muchos años, y con esto siempre ha generado los ingresos para su hogar. Uno de sus mayores  problemas es la violencia en la zona. Actualmente está volviendo a sacar la tienda adelante. Gracias a que ha podido ir teniendo buenas ventas, y buscando superar la dificultad de dinero, Vanessa  busca un préstamo para comprar una vitrina y surtir los de productos de la canasta familiar y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes.

Su sueño es tener una tienda cada vez más grande e incluirle cada vez más productos para aumentar la variedad de que ofrece. Además, aspira a poder ofrecerle a su hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Vanessa lives in the city of La Libertad in the province of Santa Elena. She is 25 years old and the mother of one daughter who is six years old. Her daughter is enrolled at the local public school. For many years she has worked managing her own general store and in this has way she has always earned the money to support her family. One of her biggest problems right now is the violence in the area. Right now she is just returning to reopen the store. She has been fortunate enough to have good sales, but she's always looking for other ways to overcome financial difficulties. For this reason, Vanessa is requesting a loan in order to purchase a display case and to stock up on typical food basket items in order to better respond to customer demand.

Her goal is to continue growing her store bigger and bigger and to be able to stock more products in order to offer a greater variety. Also, she hopes to be able to provide her daughter with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a display case and typical grocery items for the family such as rice, oil, etc.

loans.name: Carmen Del Rocio

texts.es: Carmen tiene  36 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos que estudian en una escuela pública. Carmen tiene un puesto de venta de víveres en general, a raíz de la separación del padre de sus hijos ella ha salido  adelante con sus hijos. Su sueño es poder tener un local propio donde vender sus productos ya que al venderlo en un puesto improvisado tiene miedo  a ser asaltada por delincuentes. Con el crédito comprar arroz, aceite, azúcar, fideos etc.
texts.en: Carmen is 36 years old and is the single mother of two children who are enrolled in a public school. Carmen manages a vendor stall where she sells general food stuffs. Due to her separation from the father of her two children, she has decided to strive on ahead with her kids. She dreams of one day having her own store from which to sell her goods as she is fearful of being attacked by delinquents while selling them form her improvised stall. With this loan she will purchase rice, oil, sugar, pasta, etc.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, sugar, pasta, etc.

loans.name: Elsy Jacinta

texts.es: Elsy tiene 46 años de edad es casada tiene 1 hijo de 15 años que estudia en un colegio publico. Ella comenzó hace 10 años con su liquidación de su último trabajo. Se compro una máquina de coser y de ahí poco a poco fue aumentado sus clientes con arreglo de ropa y confecciones hasta llegar a tener su propio taller de costura. En la actualidad ella trabaja a las 8:00 de la mañana hasta la 5 de la tarde que culmina su trabajo, el deseo y anhelo de Elsy es también ser una diseñadora de modas. Con el préstamo ella quisiera comprar implementos como: hilos, telas, cierres, y otra máquina de coser etc.
texts.en:
Elsy, age 46, is married and has a 15 year old son who goes to a public school.  

She started ten years ago with the settlement from her last job.  She bought a sewing machine, and from there she was, little by little, getting more customers by fixing and making clothes.  She did this until she came to have her own sewing shop.

She currently works from eight in the morning until five in the afternoon when she finishes her work.  Elsy’s wish and her desire is to be a fashion designer.

She would like to use the loan to buy implements like thread, fabric, zippers, and another sewing machine, etc.

loans.use: to buy thread, fabric, zippers, and another sewing machine, etc.

loans.name: Mariana Catalina

texts.es: Mariana vive en el suburbio de la ciudad de Guayaquil es divorciada tiene hijos mayores de edad por lo que son independientes. Hace 8 años empezó con el negocio de venta de productos de cosméticos por catálogos. La forma de trabajo es recorrer diversos lugares de la ciudad ofertando los productos entre amigos y conocidos.  Mariana por el momento no ha tenido ningún inconveniente en cuanto a la delincuencia y espera poder continuar de esta manera. Con el crédito piensa comprar, artículos de belleza como labiales, sombras, perfumes, cremas etc. Su sueño es poder comprar unas perchas y poder exhibir sus productos en su casa etc.
texts.en: Mariana lives in Suburbio, in the city of Guayaquil.  She is divorced and has three adult children who live independently.  Eight years ago, she started a business selling catalog cosmetics.  She makes her sales by travelling to different parts of the city, offering her products to friends and acquaintances.  Mariana has, up to now, not suffered any problems with crime and she hopes to be able to continue not to.  She plans to use her loan to buy beauty products such as lipsticks, eyeshadow, perfume, creams, etc.  Her dream is to be able to buy some stands and display her products in her home.

loans.use: to buy beauty products such as lipsticks, eyeshadow, perfume, creams, etc.

loans.name: Marcial Geoconda

texts.es: Marcia vive en el cantón playas de la provincia del Guayas, tiene 37 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos de 17 años y el otro de 8 años el mayor estudia en un colegio cerca del sector y el menor estudia en una escuela pública. Marcia comenzó hace 10 años atrás trabajando en una camaronera, debido a la reducción de personal la liquidaron y decidió establecer su propio negocio de venta de calzado deportivo por catalogo, poco a poco ha aumentado sus clientes. Con el crédito quiere comprar una vitrina y calzados. Su meta a futuro es comprarse un carro para poder realizar las entrega de sus productos a lugares lejanos
texts.en:
Marcia lives in the beach canton in the province of Guayas, Ecuador. She is 37 years old and a single mother of 2 children ages 17 and 8. Her oldest is a high-school student in a nearby public school. 

10 years ago, Marcia began working in a shrimp farm, but she lost her job in a round of layoffs. That is why she decided to open her own business selling athletic shoes from catalogs. Little by little, she has been building up her client base. 

With this loan, Marcia wishes to buy a display case and shoes for her business. Her goal for the future is to buy a car so she will be able to deliver her products to customers who live farther away.

loans.use: to buy shoes and a display case.

loans.name: Juana Judith

texts.es: Juana vive en el cantón Playas de la provincia del Guayas, tiene 35 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos el mayor de 12 años que asiste a un colegio cerca de su casa y el menor de 7 años que asiste a una escuela pública. Hace 8 años empezó con el negocio de venta de productos de cosméticos por catálogos. La forma de trabajo es recorrer diversos lugares de la ciudad ofertando los productos entre amigos y conocidos. Juana por el momento no ha tenido ningún inconveniente en cuanto a la delincuencia y espera poder continuar de esta manera. Ella trabaja de lunes a sábados desde la 9 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde . Con el crédito comprara artículos de belleza como labiales, sombras, perfumes, cremas etc. Su sueño es poder comprar unas perchas y poder exhibir sus productos en su casa etc.
texts.en:
Juana lives in the Playas canton in the Guayas province.  She is 35 years old and a single mother.  She has two children.  The oldest is 12 and goes to a school close to her house.  The younger one is 7 and goes to a public school.  

Eight years ago she started the business of selling cosmetic products by catalog.  The way she works is by traveling through different locations in the city and offering her products to her friends and acquaintances.  

So far Jauna has had no problems with delinquency, and she hopes to be able to continue in this manner.  She works Mondays through Saturdays from nine in the morning until one in the afternoon.

She will use the loan to buy beauty products like lipstick, eye shadow, perfume, and creams, etc.  Her dream is to be able to buy some racks and to be able to display her products at her house, etc.

loans.use: to buy beauty products like lipstick, eye shadow, perfume, and creams, etc.
